name: Cherrybrook, Sydney
summary: Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney. Our very comfortable house has all the amenities you are used to. We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). Public transport to the CBD is 1 minute from our door.
space: Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney and thank you for checking our listing!  There are 2 bedrooms. One has a queen bed. The other has two king singles. A third bedroom can be made available on request.  The house:  Come and stay in our very comfortable house. You will enjoy the feel of the house with polished floor boards, restored timber furniture and bold coloured walls. The bathroom is newly renovated and very clean. There is a kitchenette in the laundry where you can prepare light meals. There is a refrigerator, kettle, toaster and microwave oven for your use. In addition the house boasts:  - Wireless Internet  - Air Conditioning / Heating - Pool - Deck with a BBQ The area:  We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). In walking distance you will find the the lakes of Cherrybrook and Greenway Park as well as shops, restaurants and a large supermarket. There is a National Park with walking tracks within a few minutes walk from the house. Public Transpo
description: Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney. Our very comfortable house has all the amenities you are used to. We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). Public transport to the CBD is 1 minute from our door. Welcome to Cherrybrook in Sydney and thank you for checking our listing!  There are 2 bedrooms. One has a queen bed. The other has two king singles. A third bedroom can be made available on request.  The house:  Come and stay in our very comfortable house. You will enjoy the feel of the house with polished floor boards, restored timber furniture and bold coloured walls. The bathroom is newly renovated and very clean. There is a kitchenette in the laundry where you can prepare light meals. There is a refrigerator, kettle, toaster and microwave oven for your use. In addition the house boasts:  - Wireless Internet  - Air Conditioning / Heating - Pool - Deck with a BBQ The area:  We are located in the suburbs of Sydney, and very close to bushland (forest). In w
transit: A regular bus service to and from the CBD and the local railway station runs from the corner of our street (about 50 metres away.) Coming from the airport: Take the train to Town Hall in the CBD. Exit to George St and head west (downhill) via Druitt St to Kent St (passing York and Clarence as you go). Turn right into Kent St and the bus stop is on your left on the corner of Druitt Place (NOT Druitt Lane which is close by). Catch the 621 or 620X bus and ask the driver to advise you when the bus reaches YANDERRA GROVE in Cherrybrook. Alight at this stop. The trip takes about 50 minutes. Cross Francis Greenway Drive and almost in front of you is Tudor Ave. We are the 4th house on the left. Our house (no 7) is on the corner of Tudor and Pogson Drive. Alternatively, but a little more expensive perhaps, take the train from the airport to Central and change to a train to Pennant Hills (trains stopping at Pennant Hills will normally be marked as Hornsby trains via Macquarie Park and Epping). E
access: The second bathroom is available to bookings of 6 people and over. Please let us know at the time of booking. By arrangement only access to the kitchen for evening meal preparation is between 6:30 and 8:00pm. The washing machine is available by request only. Please advise if you wish to wash clothes in the machine.
interaction: We live at the house so we will be around during your stay.
house_rules: We are a shoe-free house - we leave our shoes in the foyer and wear house shoes inside. Damp towels are always hung in the bathroom not on furniture etc in the rooms. Showers after 10:00pm are not encouraged so others can sleep undisturbed. Use of the kitchen for evening meals is available between 6:00pm and 8:00pm. Other than that we are pretty low-key.
host_about:
My wife and I live in Cherrybrook. We look forward to welcoming you in the near future! 

We enjoy a wonderful area of Sydney with lots of birds (cockatoos, parrots, kookaburras) and some lovely bush walks close at hand.

The local shops are about 1km from us where you can buy foodstuffs, newspapers, coffee etc. There are a few restaurants and cafes as well. But the coffee at our place is better!!

We love music and listen to classical music a lot, as well as contemporary stuff. We play sport (football) and I am a cyclist.

The house has a good ambiance with polished timber floors, bold wall colours, and plenty of artwork and photos on the walls. You can take in the garden while you are here too. There are several places to sit and enjoy the greenery and listen to running water.

name: Lovely Family Home Close to Manly!
summary: A light, spacious and very attractive 1920's house in a great location close to everything that Manly offers.
space: The house has a prime location in Fairlight, just minutes from the harbour foreshore and all the attraction and amenities of Manly. It is a 2-storey brick 1920's house with lots of light and character. We have recently renovated the kitchen/dining room and the garden. There is a separate living room, a sunroom full of toys and 3 bedrooms. One has a queen bed, one a double and the third has two single beds (which could be joined to make a big queen).  There is also a cot.  There is a sunny deck with daybed and a leafy courtyard garden, perfect for alfresco meals and bbqs.  Free wi-fi.    We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
description: A light, spacious and very attractive 1920's house in a great location close to everything that Manly offers. The house has a prime location in Fairlight, just minutes from the harbour foreshore and all the attraction and amenities of Manly. It is a 2-storey brick 1920's house with lots of light and character. We have recently renovated the kitchen/dining room and the garden. There is a separate living room, a sunroom full of toys and 3 bedrooms. One has a queen bed, one a double and the third has two single beds (which could be joined to make a big queen).  There is also a cot.  There is a sunny deck with daybed and a leafy courtyard garden, perfect for alfresco meals and bbqs.  Free wi-fi.    We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network. The whole house. We will not be at home during your stay - we rent the house out when we are on holiday. The house is a five-minute walk from the lovely loc
neighborhood_overview: The house is a five-minute walk from the lovely local harbour beach and rock pool at Fairlight. Here you can join the Manly Scenic Walkway. Manly is a 15 minute stroll in one direction. The bars, restaurants, beaches, aquarium, ferry, shops and atmosphere of Manly need no further promotion. Turn west at Fairlight Beach and the Scenic Walkway meanders for 2-3 hours along the harbour edge - it is one of the finest walks in Australia. Manly Dam and a 50m pool provide more watery pleasures nearby. There is a new modern shopping centre with Coles, butchers, grocers, Bakers Delight etc a 5-minute walk away in Balgowlah. Heading north, a glorious string of beaches ends at Palm Beach and beautiful Pittwater.  Finally, of course, you can catch a ferry to the city to explore a huge array of world-famous attractions. We are happy to discuss car rental, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
transit: We are happy to discuss the rental of our car, but most local points of interest are best reached on foot, bike or the freebie bus network.
access: The whole house.
interaction: We will not be at home during your stay - we rent the house out when we are on holiday.
house_rules: We don't have many rules except - no smoking inside, no extra guests without approval, be considerate towards our neighbours and treat the property with respect.
host_about: We are a professional couple (both Architects) with 3 children aged 13, 11 and 7. We are from England and settled in the Manly area 16 years ago. We bought this house in 2007. We love the outdoor lifestyle offered by the Northern Beaches and spend lots of time surfing, swimming, sailing and walking. We have travelled extensively overseas and as the children get older we hope to have more adventures.   Our house is in a fabulous holiday location and we don't like it to sit empty while we travel if someone else could be enjoying it.  We did several house swaps a few years ago and Airbnb has expanded our options for accommodation further.  Our children are very well-behaved and they are used to respecting other people's houses.  We have no animals but could possibly care for something small in a holiday home.

name: Sydney City Edge: 8 mins walk to Hyde Park
summary: The splendid new International Conference Centre (ICC) is now open and a  $7 Uber Ride will take you to the Southern entrance, or the Light Rail drops you right at the front door!  You could choose to walk through Chinatown and stop on the way to shop or eat -  with a large choice of restaurants and cafes. This is just one of the big advantages of staying here.  Save time, save money and enjoy the very best of Sydney! N.B. There is a MINIMUM 4 night stay over New Year's Eve.
space: Welcome to Sydney! A large comfy queen size bed awaits you within this bright and airy room with windows that let the sun shine in and can be opened to allow for fresh air.  There is also reverse cycle air conditioning and FREE WiFi. This is a traditional 1897 Sydney terrace on three and a half levels situated just south of Hyde Park and in walking distance of Central Railway Station - six to eight minutes. We are close to *Hyde Park  *Centre Point Tower. * Opera House  *Sydney Harbour Bridge  *Darling Harbour  *Chinatown,  * theatres. *museums. *art galleries. *St Mary's Cathedral. *Fox Studios.  *Sydney Cricket Ground.  *The Famous Sydney Fish Market   *swimming pools  *the Domain.  There are some of the best cafes, restaurants and coffee shops in walking distance which serve some of the best coffee you can get anywhere in the world - and you can shop till you drop in the City, Darling Harbour, The Rocks and Oxford Street.  And while you are staying here - walk two blocks up the hill

You could choose to walk through Chinatown and stop on the way to shop or eat -  with a large choice of restaurants and cafes. This is just one of the big advantages of staying here. A large comfy queen size bed awaits you within this bright and airy room with windows that let the sun shine in and can be opened to allow for fresh air.  There is also reverse cycle air conditioning and FREE WiFi. This is a traditional 1897 Sydney terrace on three and a half levels situated just south of Hyde Park and in walking distance of Central Railway Station - six to eight minutes. We are close to *Hyde Park  *Centre Point Tower. * Opera House  *Sydney Harbour Bridge  *Darling Harbour  *Ch
neighborhood_overview: I feel that the reason why I have many repeat bookings is simply because it is so easy to get around from this location.  When I travel overseas I always choose the place closest to the Central Railway Station as this is usually an indicator of easy access to all amenities. It also means that I don't have to spend money and time finding my way on public transport for everyday things. It is just so convenient when you can walk to places you need to be - and also more efficient.  And that is what this place offers. A six or 7 minute walk from Central.
notes: Please ask if there is anything which you are not comfortable with. I am always happy to listen and make sure that your needs are met if possible. Remember questions ARE the answers!
transit: This neighbourhood is so very convenient to get around everywhere. And the quantity and quality of the places to eat is exceptional. There is a restaurant or cafe to suit everyone's choice. I am and have been totally organic for over 6 years now so if anyone wants advice on where to get the best organic choice, please ask me.
access: I am very happy to spend time with guests if this is what they want however, I am equally comfortable to leave guests to enjoy their own schedule. It is my belief that people who choose to stay at a BnB are very lovely people and willing to share stories and time together when it fits in with their plans. Guests are welcome to use the kitchen for tea or coffee anytime, and there is a very large range of teas to choose from plus organic coffee, and also to prepare a light breakfast from time to time. I have found that most guests choose to eat out and enjoy the varied range of foods in this neighborhood without the work of shopping and preparation and cleaning up afterwards! After all, they are on holiday and spending time "at home" cuts down time enjoying this beautiful city.
interaction: Communication is everything - please ask if there is anything you want to know.
house_rules: I am very happy to spend time with guests if this is what they want however, I am equally comfortable to leave guests to enjoy their own schedule. It is my belief that people who choose to stay at a BnB are very lovely people and willing to share stories and time together when it fits in with their plans. Guests are welcome to use the kitchen for tea or coffee anytime, and there is a very large range of teas to choose from plus organic coffee, and also to prepare a light breakfast occasionally. I have found that most guests choose to eat out and enjoy the varied range of foods and the ambiance of the city.  There are no laundry facilities here - and no drier. The laundry diagonally opposite the front door washes, dries and folds your clothes for a very reasonable rate which save your valuable holiday time!
host_about:
I'm into health, fitness and organic food, and before retirement, worked as a senior manager for 20 years for a multi national newspaper corporation.
My interests are meeting people and conversation. 
I enjoy hearing other people's stories and learning about  their experiences.
Having lived in Sydney for 26 years, I am always happy to recommend restaurants and things to see.
Any early risers who stay here are welcome to drive with me to Bondi Beach to enjoy the beautiful view and walk barefoot in the sand - a great way to get over jet lag fast.  One thing - I usually aim to be there before 6 am. 

Everyone is different, and that's OK".

The things I can't live without?    
Mmmm . . . my family, fresh ocean air, good healthy simple food, exercise, the company and conversation of positive, happy people. 
And most importantly . . .  just being. 
We are human beings . . .  not human doings.
Looking forward to meeting you!

name: Northern Beaches slice of paradise
space: Welcome to Northern Beaches, Sydney and thank you for checking my listing! Come stay and enjoy our spacious home and beautiful property. The house can sleep up to 6 people in 3 double bedrooms. It boasts all the amenities you are used to at home. Feel free to make use of the fully equipped kitchen or enjoy some downtime in the living area or on the deck which looks out over the tree tops on to a large, leafy, sun drenched backyard with swimming pool. Our property backs on to a birdlife reserve for the bird lovers amongst us. In addition the house comes with swimming pool, wifi internet, washer / dryer, BBQ You will enjoy a beautiful location and many of the famous beaches are just 3 km away. There is a large shopping mall within walking distance. You will be close to public transport and many parks, playgrounds, bush walks and spectacular beaches which are just 20 minutes walk away. description: Welcome to Northern Beaches, Sydney and thank you for checking my listing! Come stay and enjoy our spacious home and beautiful property. The house can sleep up to 6 people in 3 double bedrooms. It boasts all the amenities you are used to at home. Feel free to make use of the fully equipped kitchen or enjoy some downtime in the living area or on the deck which looks out over the tree tops on to a large, leafy, sun drenched backyard with swimming pool. Our property backs on to a birdlife reserve for the bird lovers amongst us. In addition the house comes with swimming pool, wifi internet, washer / dryer, BBQ You will enjoy a beautiful location and many of the famous beaches are just 3 km away. There is a large shopping mall within walking distance. You will be close to public transport and many parks, playgrounds, bush walks and spectacular beaches which are just 20 minutes walk away. Waterfall and wetlands reserve creek walk accessed from backyard. There is an onsite caretaker for any p

Hi everyone. 
I am a photographer and love the outdoors. I am looking forward to welcoming you in our special home set amongst a beautiful backdrop in Sydney's Northern Beaches.

name: Jacques Ave 3 bedroom, center of Bondi 1 min beach
summary: "Jacques Ave" is a spacious three bedroom apartment in one of the original buildings in the heart of Bondi Beach.  Superbly located seconds away from the beach, shops, restaurants, transport and some of the best cafes in town.
space: This spacious apartment offers three comfortable bedrooms and an original retro vibe throughout.  Ideally close to it all yet quiet and tranquil, this pleasant property is sure to impress. The apartment features designer retro furniture and artworks, top of the range kitchen appliances, flat screen TV, and all quality bed linens and towels. All rooms offer grand 3m high ceilings with remote controlled ceiling fans and floorboards throughout.  Master bedroom : Built in wardrobes, king sized bed (or two singles on request), enjoys a perched view from the large bay window.  Second bedroom:  Sunny with mirrored built in wardrobes and queen bed Third bedroom: Sunroom with a single bed. Slate tiled bathroom with shower/ bath. Internal laundry with LG Washing Machine (front load) and Dryer located on the balcony. The ultra comfortable lounge offers– Sony Bravia LCD TV screen and Foxtel. Leading from the lounge to the private balcony is the highly functional kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops–

neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is one of the most sought out neighbourhoods in Sydney. With its lush surroundings and amazing restaurants and shops no wonder no one wants to leave!
notes: There is metered street parking only directly out side of the apartment. A temporary parking permit can be obtained for $46/month from Waverley Council Office (8.30am - 5pm Mon-Fri) at 55 Spring St, Bondi Junction, NSW 2022 or online. Requires a photo or copy of the registration to be shown to prove vehicle identity. Submit a Temporary Parking Permit Application with vehicle make, model and registration number. A vacation rental lease document proving that you are staying at the address, and an ID. For rental cars getting a permit can only be done after the car is collected.
transit: There are wonderful public buses that run every 5 minutes and will take you up to Watsons Bay or up to Bondi junction where you can catch transfer buses and trains directly into the city, CBD, Opera house etc.
access: Guests have access to the entire home.
interaction: We are available to assist guests at anytime.
house_rules: 1. STRICTLY No partying is allowed in our properties and parties or noise disturbance may result in loss of bond.   2. No pets are allowed (except in pet friendly homes).   3. Number of guests must be known (inclusive of kids and babies) by Bondi Beach Holiday Homes when booking. An extra guest outside the agreement will not allowed and will result is deduction from security bond.   4. There is no smoking in our holiday homes. There is a $200 fee charged for special cleaning to rid of smoke odor.   5. You are welcome to hire a port a cot and high chair for an additional $30 AUD each CHECK IN Lockbox AT PROPERTY. Keys will be available for collection from 3pm onwards. We require a scanned/photo of ID to be sent by email prior to arrival to receive your access code. The second set of keys will be in the apartment and both sets should be left INSIDE the apartment please when you depart.  CHECK OUT Before 10 AM or at the pre-arranged time with the owners. Please leave keys in the apartment
host_about:
Welcome to your one stop for holiday accommodation in & around Bondi Beach. 
We offer a selection of beautifully furnished holiday homes with modern comforts & spacious living areas. All homes are immaculately kept & located in prime locations near the city & beach with public transportation nearby.

Our holiday rentals include complimentary Wi-Fi, luxury bedding and much more.

Perfect for guests looking for a beautiful home away from home. We invite you to enjoy Sydney in one of ours.

See you at the beach!
Gina & the team

Bondi Beach Holiday Homes

name: Cosy Flat by the Sea!
space: Welcome to Clovelly! Quiet, peaceful flat in a block of 8 situated on the Bondi to Maroubra coastal walk.  1 bedroom with views of Clovelly and the ocean.  The "other" pets are just fish who need daily feeding.  There is plenty of safe and on street free parking. There are views of the ocean with a quick run across the road to Clovelly beach and Gordon's Bay Aquatic reserve for swimming and snorkelling.  A wide range of convenience shops, cafes and restaurants are nearby as well the Clovelly Hotel and Clovelly Bowling Club with breathtaking ocean views. Quick bus transport into Sydney centre, either via Surry Hills or Bondi Junction train station as well as Sydney Airport, Cricket Ground, Centennial Park, Paddington Markets, University of NSW, Prince of Wales hospitals, Football Stadium and Randwick Races.  All mod cons including wifi and tv, large bathroom, fully stocked kitchen if you want to stay in and cook, water filter, laundry downstairs. Linen and towels provided.  Perfect for

name: HIGHLY ENERGISED BEACH RETREAT
space: Beautiful art deco apartment in Coogee, one of Sydney's eastern beaches.   The apartment has a very high vibration from consistent meditation and healing work over the last 5 years.  It is physically and energetically very clean and you will feel good as soon as you step inside.   There is a bath, and the queen size bed has 1200 count cotton sheets.  The furniture is a mix of antiques and contemporary designer pieces, and there are hundreds of books and DVDs.   I will be storing all my personal and precious stuff in the second bedroom, but the rest of the house will be ready for you to experience as I live in it.  Happy to have a conversation about using the built-in garage as well as the car for an extra fee.   The main restaurant strip and the beach are, literally, just around the corner and I can recommend many great places to eat.  There is a charming art deco cinema at the top of the hill.   Coogee is 20 mins by bus to the city and 20 mins by cab to the airport.   The University o
description: Beautiful art deco apartment in Coogee, one of Sydney's eastern beaches.   The apartment has a very high vibration from consistent meditation and healing work over the last 5 years.  It is physically and energetically very clean and you will feel good as soon as you step inside.   There is a bath, and the queen size bed has 1200 count cotton sheets.  The furniture is a mix of antiques and contemporary designer pieces, and there are hundreds of books and DVDs.   I will be storing all my personal and precious stuff in the second bedroom, but the rest of the house will be ready for you to experience as I live in it.  Happy to have a conversation about using the built-in garage as well as the car for an extra fee.   The main restaurant strip and the beach are, literally, just around the corner and I can recommend many great places to eat.  There is a charming art deco cinema at the top of the hill.   Coogee is 20 mins by bus to the city and 20 mins by cab to the airport.   The University o
notes: Only 20 minutes by taxi from Kingsford Smith airport.
access: Everything, except the second bedroom (which will be locked).
interaction: I will be travelling abroad during the Christmas/New Year period but a good friend will be available to help.
house_rules: Non-smoking building of 9 apartments (3 per floor).  Common roof-top terrace with unobstructed views of Coogee Beach - available for laundry and for quiet retreat.   This is a quiet building with most tenants being professional or retired.  Tenants respect each others privacy, but the building is very harmonious.   This apartment will suit middle aged professional person or couple wanting to experience  the Eastern Beaches for a few months, or a person who is temporarily working in the city or needs convenient access to the airport (note that although the airport is close, i rarely hear any aircraft noise).  Tenant will be responsible for cleaning. Bond will be required.
host_about:
G'day, I'm Paul. I hope you have a minute to have a look at my apartment in Coogee, which I think is pretty special.

I'm non-smoking, non-drinking, vegetarian.  I meditate as often as I can... and people often remark on how peaceful the house is.  I have been facilitating healing work in the house (using an apparatus from Brasil) part-time for about 9 years. 

I currently work at the Australian National Maritime Museum in a senior role.  But I have spent over 20 years in various policy roles for various Governments in Australia (most recently in Arts policy), as well a being a member of various regulatory boards.  

The ocean is really my thing... and I live here because of the proximity to the beach.  And after the beach would come coffee and pastry - both of which are available just outside the house ;)

I'm dedicated to doing the best I can during this lifetime and I'm hoping to rent out my apartment to cover the costs of pilgrimage to Israel over Christmas and New Year 2016/17.   I've written several books about pilgrimage and holy saints. 

Please be in contact with me for any bookings and inquiries. A good friend will take care of you while I'm travelling. 

I look forward to hearing from you!

Namaste
Paul
amenities: {TV,Kitchen,"Free parking on premises","Buzzer/wireless intercom",Washer,Dryer}

name: An Oasis in the centre of vibrant Surry Hills
summary: A fantastic house  canopied by a Chinese Tree of Heaven and filled with light. A wonderful location around the corner from great restaurants , galleries and unique shopping.  5 minutes from the city and 10 minutes to Circular Quay / Opera House.
space: Surry Hills is the most vibrant and exciting place, in which, to live. It is the home of artists and creative people and is replete with restaurants, theatres and galleries. There are numerous original clothing shops and interesting gift shops.  The house is within walking distance of the city and is an exceptional location for those interested in unique cuisine. This is my home and I rent it out while I am working overseas or interstate. It is a beautiful house to stay in because of the unique light and the quality of peace created by the Chinese Tree of Heaven. Around the corner is the dynamic and hip Crown Street filled with life, people and great shopping. You are only five minutes from the city and fifteen minutes away from access to all the main holiday attractions and yet it feels as though you are in the country. A true oasis.  House, 2 Bedrooms + Office, 1.5 Baths (Sleeps 4-6) It is an unusual and exotic two storey house situated opposite a park and comprises of two pavilions

neighborhood_overview: Situated in Surry Hills the most exciting neighbour hood in Sydney around the corner from Crown Street and Oxford Street you have easy access to Sydney's best restaurants, theatres, cinemas,  galleries and fashion boutiques. Across the park from football stadiums, Fox  Studios. Very close to swimming pools, golf courses,  In the centre of it all but so secluded!
notes: This is an intimate neighbourhood guests are required to have consideration for their neighbours.  No parties.  Please respect your/our neighbours-no loud music or tv after 11pm please. A rental agreement must be signed before check-in.  The house must be left in the same setup and condition as it was found.
transit: You are within walking distance of the City and Central Station and have excellent public transport outside the front door.   Ten minutes by bus to Circular Quay, Darling Harbour, the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge. Twenty minutes by bus to Bondi, Bronte and Clovelly beaches.
access: The whole house is your space
interaction: If you need help at any time you can reach me on (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

Phone charges will come out of the security deposit. Smoking allowed in courtyard. No Smoking inside, We are new to Airbnb and very open to how we can improve your stay. Thank you.

summary: Located on the Nth headland over looking Curl Curl Beach, Sydney, this very modern 3 story beach house is just 200m walk from famous Nth Curl Curl Beach, with sweeping ocean views. This Family home is only rented out for 6 weeks a year over Christmas.... a real gem that is always sought after and booked during this period. The Pool Cabana is a fantastic place to watch the cricket in summer whilst the kids are playing.... digital TV, drinks fridge, and external laundry! Level two and three balconies have expansive views over the beach and a large entertaining Nth facing balcony overlooks the pool, which allows families to keep an easy watch over the kids in the pool. The second level of the house is the entertaining floor with the two sets of double under mount sinks on the 10 meter long kitchen with large dining areas internal and external - perfect for entertaining. The two balconies facing south have panoramic views across Curl Curl to Manly 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms mean loads of space to stretch out inside as well! name: Modern apt. in Camperdown, Sydney
summary: Very well located modern, open plan apartment. 5-10 minute walk from the vibrant King St whilst the apartment is tucked away somewhere a little more peaceful. Enjoy unrestricted access to all features of our home during times that we are not using it
space: This very well located apartment features open plan living with adjoining kitchen, dining and lounge room. A large undercover balcony extends the full length of the apartment. The spacious main bathroom has a full size bath. The master bedroom has an en suite.  The apartment is modern, inside and out with a variety of amenities to further enhance the comfort of your stay: 46" LED TV, free wifi internet, 3 burner gas BBQ dishwasher, gas stove, washing machine, dryer,  and much more. The main bedroom has a queen size bed. The second bedroom has a single bed which can be expanded into a king size bed on request. Our place is in a pleasant neighbourhood in Camperdown with a number of close-by parks. It is a 5-10 minute walk from the vibrant King Street, Newtown, which is also where you'll find the closest train station. Walking 5-10 minutes in the other direction, to Parramatta Rd, gets you to the bus stop where you can get on any bus to take you to the city. Newtown is well known for it's

neighborhood_overview: We are so close to a vast array of amazing parks, cafes, restaurants, bars, pubs, all kinds of shops, transport - yet tucked away in a quiet area.
notes: We have Netflix on the big TV which means you'll have Netflix on the big TV.
transit: 1 minute walk to the closest bus stop (Salisbury Rd) to get to city. Or 5 minute walk to more frequent buses on Parramatta Rd. 10 minute walk to Newtown train station. If driving, avoid King St as it is almost always very busy with traffic. When heading south it's best to use Salisbury Rd, Liberty Rd, Edgeware Rd and Unwins Bridge Rd to rejoin Princes Hwy. Uber services this area too :-) We generally get around on foot most of the time.
access: No restricted access.
interaction: We shall remain contactable via airbnb messaging througout your stay, as well as by email and mobile phone if required. The House Manual section also local contact details in case anything urgent comes up.
house_rules: - It's important to close and lock balcony security shutters (louvres) whenever the apartment is being left empty, even if only for a short period of time - No smoking - No pets - With food, you may help yourself to tea, instant coffee, margarine, condiments (jams, peanut butter, vegemite, sauces, etc) but no other food or beverage is included in the price of the stay
host_about:
I live in the Inner West area of Sydney with my lovely wife Monique. We enjoy at least two decent holidays each year and will offer our home on airbnb during those times as well as during any short trips away.

I work for a Software Vendor as Technical Consultant and I'm fully aware that this rarely makes for exciting conversation. Nevertheless it's a job that I love.

I like to keep fit - running, swimming, cycling, playing tennis, Oztag, weights. Healthy body --> Healthy mind. I see this exercise as a means of accruing food & beverage credits :-) Being a lover of good food and wine/beer, that's very important to me... And the area we live in definitely caters for these pleasures.

access: Kitchen is almost always available for your use. Come and cook up a storm if you want to.
interaction: I'm happy to give you a map, tourist suggestions and help in any way to make your stay enjoyable and relaxing.
house_rules: No tobacco smoking in the house.
host_about: I am the father of three amazing humans. I enjoy spending time with them. I work as a photographer from home, where I live with Jasper the Visla and Baeko the rascal toy poodle. The space has to be very versatile, as I do a range of things in it. I love Summer and go snorkelling, ride my motorbike, bicycle and reluctantly keep fit. I love catching up with my friends for coffee and eating out.

name: Manly Sunshine Cottage - quiet family retreat
summary: 2 Bedroom cottage close to Manly with tranquil garden and space to relax. Only 2Km from the heart of Manly.
space: Combining the Manly lifestyle with space and tranquillity of an artist retreat, this 2 bedroom cottage is located on the beach lagoon-side of Manly Vale, only 2Km from the heart of Manly. Perfect for families or couples wanting to enjoy the relaxed lifestyle of Manly but without the hustle and bustle. The cottage is described as a sunshine house, where each room catches the sun providing light and air. It is beautifully decorated with modern and vintage pieces combined to create a comfortable and Vogue style ambience.  You can wake every morning to the peace of a sun drenched garden dispersed by the occasional chatter of birds. While you enjoy your breakfast on the private north facing deck you can plan whether to go for a level walk to the beach or Manly on the cycle path just outside the door, or enjoy the sights of Sydney. If you need to shop and you don't have a car you are only 10 minutes walk from buses to the city and local shopping centres. The main bedroom has a comfy pillow t

If you need to shop and you don't have a car you are o
house_rules: Nothing unusual, just no smoking in the cottage, be considerate towards our neighbours, treat the cottage with love and respect and leave it in the same condition as you arrived. Dinner parties with several guests are fine. Maximum of 5 guests are allowed, including infants. Note that the Airbnb booking system allows you to book up to 5 guests plus additional infants. We can only accomodate a maximum of 5 including infants.
host_location: Manly Vale, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Hi, we are Clive and Terese with our three children. I have lived in the Manly area all my life and with our family for more than 20 years. I wouldn't have it any other way.

We love travelling and meeting new people and experiences. With a growing family there is never enough time to travel as we use to. So with holiday letting we get to meet travellers from around the world and help them experience our part of paradise.

We are lucky to have a holiday house on our property, and love it being enjoyed by our guests.

name: Sunny Bondi Studio with Garage, Pool and Balcony
summary: My Bondi apartment is simply furnished and appointed, but is fully equipped for a great holiday or business stay. It's surrounded by  restaurants & food shops, has a bus stop outside, a balcony with ocean view, a lock-up garage and is an easy ten minute walk to the beach.
space: My Bondi apartment is simply furnished and  appointed, but  is fully equipped for a wonderful holiday or business stay. It is in a great location. surrounded by gourmet food shops, cafes and restaurants, with a bus stop outside the door. It has a balcony with a view of the neighbourhood and the ocean, and its own secure garage- a fantastic asset in busy Bondi. The apartment faces the east, so you are greeted by the morning sun streaming through the large windows. There is a rooftop pool, with panoramic views of the beach and the city. Perfect spot for watching Sydney's New Year's Eve fireworks- and no traffic to contend with afterwards, just go downstairs to bed! I live in this apartment when I am working in Sydney, so it has all the comforts of home, including 100% cotton bedsheets and pure wool blankets- no nasty synthetics! and good cooking facilities and equipment.  There is a pantry cupboard, stocked with essentials, full sized fridge and lots of cupboards for storage in the kitch
description: My Bondi apartment is simply furnished and appointed, but is fully equipped for a great holiday or business stay. It's surrounded by  restaurants & food shops, has a bus stop outside, a balcony with ocean view, a lock-up garage and is an easy ten minute walk to the beach. My Bondi apartment is simply furnished and  appointed, but  is fully equipped for a wonderful holiday or business stay. It is in a great location. surrounded by gourmet food shops, cafes and restaurants, with a bus stop outside the door. It has a balcony with a view of the neighbourhood and the ocean, and its own secure garage- a fantastic asset in busy Bondi. The apartment faces the east, so you are greeted by the morning sun streaming through the large windows. There is a rooftop pool, with panoramic views of the beach and the city. Perfect spot for watching Sydney's New Year's Eve fireworks- and no traffic to contend with afterwards, just go downstairs to bed! I live in this apartment when I am working in Sydney, s
neighborhood_overview: Busy, cosmopolitan, an easy downhill walk  to the beach. Close to busy Westfield shopping mall, fabulous food shops, restaurants  and public transport.
notes: Read the reviews from other guests- everyone has loved the convenient location and pleasant ambience of our place. The building is not new, so please take into account that, while our apartment  is perfectly clean by normal standards, this is a 'lived in' home- if you are expecting it to be like a 5 star hotel , this is not the place for you!
transit: Bus stops outside the door to beach, city, and Bondi Junction from where you can catch a train to anywhere in Sydney. Lots of taxis in Bondi road at all hours.
access: The entire studio apartment, the garage, and the rooftop pool.
interaction: Usually only by email- we don't live nearby. We can be contacted by phone if necessary.
house_rules: Keys are only available after $300 security bond has been lodged with Airbnb. We will post a letter box key to you, or arrange for you to collect it, and the apartment pass and key are in the letterbox. The buzzer for the garage is in the apartment. We expect you to return the keys to their places when you depart. This deposit is fully refunded after we have checked that the apartment has been left clean and tidy- guests can do this themselves,  as the apartment is small and easy to clean, or they can engage a professional cleaner ( there are contact numbers in the apartment). A $100 fee applies if we need to engage a cleaner. No smoking, no pets.
host_location: Byron Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Costume designer for film, TV & theatre with fashion industry background. My partner, and co-owner of the apartment, is a movie reviewer & sports journalist, who was a professional artist until a couple of years ago, but still paints a lot.
We live in the country near Byron bay in northern NSW and only use the Bondi apartment when we are working in or visiting Sydney.

name: Town house right in the city
summary: Right in the thick of things. Our listing has evolved as our family grows. We have 3 bedrooms, one kids room with bunks and a single,a main with a queen bed and a loft bed in our 3rd room/study and space for a mattress on the floor.
space: Great location. Entirely modern. Fully lived-in home. You will have all the conveniences the hotels lack without compromise on location.  Walking distance to all major Sydney destinations - 3 min to Chinatown, 5 min to Darling hbr, 10 to Central Station, 10 to the CBD, 15 to Star Casino, 20 to Pitt street Westfield and 30 to the Opera house.  Our house is a renovated terrace, kid friendly, small but cosy and unbeatable location. We have beds for 6 and 8 with a blow up mattress. This is our home so it will have everything you need, including fast WiFi and a complete kitchen. We have a 2 year old and a baby so we have everything you need for an infant, so you can travel light - contact us if you need more info on prams etc. While we hope people use our kitchen, it's Sydney, so there are tons of awesome food options - some nearby favourites are, Chat Thai in Thai town, Mamak's on Goulburn st, Made in Italy in Pyrmont, Lush Bucket and Quarry St cafe for awesome coffee, and Zumbo at the Sta
description: Right in the thick of things. Our listing has evolved as our family grows. We have 3 bedrooms, one kids room with bunks and a single,a main with a queen bed and a loft bed in our 3rd room/study and space for a mattress on the floor. Great location. Entirely modern. Fully lived-in home. You will have all the conveniences the hotels lack without compromise on location. We have a 2 year old and a baby so we have everything you need for an infant, so you can travel light - contact us if you need more info on prams etc. While we hope people use our kitche
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is close to so many things. It is an affordable cab ride to anywhere but you hardly need a cab when public transport is right on your door step. Its a surprisingly family friendly place with access to awesome facilities in Darling Harbour, Ian Thorpe Aquatic Center, The Powerhouse Museum and a park every few blocks.
transit: We don't drive ourselves but we have a visitors parking pass for guests who do. We get by on a combination of public transport, bicycles and goget car share. Its very well connected with its proximity to George street and Central station.
access: We have everything relatively normal people use in the course of a day (as we do actually live here). You have access to all of it during your stay. No need to bring sheets/towels, hairdryer etc its all here.  Please check if you need parking as we have limited access to passes and will allocate on request depending on how many we have from our annual allotment.
interaction: I usually answer emails within a few hours (depending on whether we are still in the country or have gone OS). Im happy to offer any advice or answer any questions. There is always someone to call in a pinch as my sister and mum both live within a few blocks. I usually don't meet the guests unless they would like to. I'm happy to grab a coffee with you if I'm around but just as happy for you to pretend I don't exist.
house_rules: We live in this house, so the only rule is to treat it like your own home, and enjoy Sydney! Oh and no smoking.
host_about:
love books, beach volleyball, squash, the great outdoors, books

We love our house and the Sydney surroundings and it's great that we can share it with other people (and help pay for the renovation! ;-)

Now we are a family of four, airbnb suits our travel style - we need the comfort and flexibility of a house. We only book through Airbnb now.

name: Exclusive Bondi Apartment BondiVIEW
space: Large one bedroom easy breezy comfortable modern launching pad in Bondi. Light bright secure sanctuary for a independent mature couple/professional relocating or visiting family/friends in the area. Quiet, modern and comfortable yet very accessible to the beach and many bars, shops and cafes on foot. Guests will have access to the whole apartment to freely use as their own.  On arrival I'll give you a tour of the apartment/access etc then the place is yours until departure! There is always something fun happening in the East and down at the beach every day and night of the week. Restaurants are buzzing, even on a Monday night in mid winter. I feel like I live in a holiday location, come and experience it for yourself. Buses depart regularly just one street or 2 minutes walk from the front door (to the city, train station and if you're too lazy to walk down, to the beach). No car required you can walk everywhere. (Kindly note, no large families, young groups or backpackers will be consi
description: Large one bedroom easy breezy comfortable modern launching pad in Bondi. Light bright secure sanctuary for a independent mature couple/professional relocating or visiting family/friends in the area. Quiet, modern and comfortable yet very accessible to the beach and many bars, shops and cafes on foot. Guests will have access to the whole apartment to freely use as their own.  On arrival I'll give you a tour of the apartment/access etc then the place is yours until departure! There is always something fun happening in the East and down at the beach every day and night of the week. Restaurants are buzzing, even on a Monday night in mid winter. I feel like I live in a holiday location, come and experience it for yourself. Buses depart regularly just one street or 2 minutes walk from the front door (to the city, train station and if you're too lazy to walk down, to the beach). No car required you can walk everywhere. (Kindly note, no large families, young groups or backpackers will be consi
access: The whole apartment to use as your own. Towels and sheets included. On street un-timed and unmetered parking.
interaction: I'm happy to have as little or as much interaction as you'd like to ensure you have a nice stay, E.g. I can provide some local tips or, if travelling from overseas, I can make local transport suggestions/bookings to and from airport etc. Usually I will just check you in and leave you to enjoy the apartment and all that Sydney has to offer. I try to keep my interactions with my guests to a minimum unless you wish to contact me.
house_rules: I ask that you care for it as if it were yours. Due to polished wooden floors please refrain from wearing stiletto and high heeled shoes inside. Please no smoking inside or on the balcony. No pets please.
host_about:
I'm proud to call myself a Bondi local having purchased this property new off the plan. My whole apartment has a sophisticated yet laid back beach pad feel and is available to you. Come, stay and enjoy the BondiVIEW lifestyle!

I'm became a host on AirBnB following my experience as a guest in 2011. I spend half my year working in Europe and the Pacific Islands so my Bondi oasis is often available. 

I work as a research academic, design poverty reduction projects and hold a UN advisory position. I'm a happy mum to a bubbly little girl too. When I'm home with my family I enjoy being involved in the local community, having the beach as my backyard and generally adore both the winter and summer vibe of living in Bondi - I'm sure you will enjoy it here too.

name: Bondi, Sydney, room in cosy flat
space: Welcome to Bondi Beach Sydney!  The apartment:  Come stay and enjoy a private room in my quiet, sunny, colourful unit at Bondi Beach - one of Australia's icons - 15 min walk away.  They will use shared kitchen and bathroom facilities; independent food arrangements. Feel free to relax in the living room or enjoy the summer warmth on the balcony. The apartment offers everything you need including:  - TV - WIFI Internet - Washer / Dryer Public Transportation:  Public transport is excellent to city. There are multiple bus lines that service the area. The 380 and 381 bus services will take you to Bondi Junction. Here you can find the CityRail train station. The 333 express bus will take you into the CBD in about 30 to 40 minutes   Your host enjoys a sense of 'home' and likes to share occasional meals with guests. There is always a very friendly atmosphere. Guests will find it a convenient and comfortable base for travel in and around Sydney. I am looking forward to welcome you to Sydney in

host_about:
I’m Italian but have been living in Australia for the last 15 years. I have always worked in restaurants and bars around the world in places such as Florida, New York and London. Now cafe owner in Sydney, married and father of a 3 year old girl. I love food, wine and traveling and have a real strong  passion for cooking and talking about different cuisines.
I also love been positive and active, sports such as running, swimming, kickboxing and capoeira. I enjoy dining out and socializing,

I will make sure you enjoy your stay in Sydney!

Mirko

name: Lugarno Lodge Garden Apartment
summary: Fully furnished two bedroom apartment in a quiet leafy suburb of Sydney about 30-45 minutes by train or car from Sydney CBD (central business district).  Your spacious accomodation is the entire lower level of our two story home.  You have private external access.  Having a car here is strongly recommended.  Nearest train station is about 5 km away.  Bus to train is possible but somewhat inconvenient.
space: You'll love this quiet suburban setting for your stay in Sydney. Only 30-45 minutes by train to Sydney's Central Station and easy access to airport train stops.  Royal National Park and other parks less than an hour's drive by car. Local shops, super market, cafes etc all within a short drive from the apartment.  We are located in a beautiful quiet peaceful suburb  with plenty of space for your group. The Apartment Situated in a lovely garden with outdoor seating and BBQ, the apartment also features: -  two bedroom flat for rent (preferred 2 week minimum rental period)  - Fully furnished - Complete kitchen and dining area - Cable TV  - Free WIFI - Laundry facilities - Private bathroom with shower, vanity, medicine cabinet - BBQ, lots of outdoor seating and gardens - Easy Airport access, 10 min. to train line - Easy access to the M5 and M7 motorways - Lots of on street parking - All utilities included in the price! - Air conditioner/heater Pricing: 2 weeks: $750/wk 3-7 weeks: $690/wk  8

notes: Smoking is allowed only outside the property on the street level.

access: We cannot accomodate children under 5 years of age.
interaction: We live above the flat you will be renting so we share the outside spaces such as garden areas and picnic tables with you.  This allows us to water the plants , pick fruit and so on!  Street parking is also shared.

host_about: My wife and I are US citizens living in Australia since 2004.  Originally from NY and Chicago and Connecticut.  We are academics and ex-academics. Happy to share what we know about Sydney and Australia.  Give us a call!

space: Welcome to Maroubra and thank you for checking this listing!  Come stay and enjoy our brand new self contained Studio apartment with separate entrance on property. name: Sydney Parkside Apartment
summary: This flat has all the features you desire whilst travelling- comfortable bed, rain-shower head, big kitchen while being centrally located to Sydney city, beaches, great restaurants,entertainment and with beautiful Centennial park right on your doorstep.
space: The Apartment The apartment features a new kitchen kitted out with everything you need to cook up a storm- induction cooktop, dishwasher, oven, pizza stone and fridge.  The bedroom is big with comfy queen size bed and massive wardrobe space.  We have installed a new bathroom with a wonderful  rain-head shower and full sized bath and heated towel rack. Other features include bamboo floors, 6 sea- dining room, awesome couch (you won't want to get off it!), TV, stereo, DVD's and internal laundry with washing machine and portable washing line on the balcony. Location We are located in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney on Alison Road in Kensington which is approx 4 kms to the Sydney CBD. The flat is centrally located and within walking distance to Moore Park Entertainment Quarter- movie cinemas, bars and restaurants,  Sydney Football stadium, Cricket grounds and Golf course, Randwick racecourse and the University of NSW and beautiful beaches like Coogee or Clovelly beach.  Across the road is Ce
description: This flat has all the features you desire whilst travelling- comfortable bed, rain-shower head, big kitchen while being centrally located to Sydney city, beaches, great restaurants,entertainment and with beautiful Centennial park right on your doorstep. The Apartment The apartment features a new kitchen kitted out with everything you need to cook up a storm- induction cooktop, dishwasher, oven, pizza stone and fridge.  The bedroom is big with comfy queen size bed and massive wardrobe space.  We have installed a new bathroom with a wonderful  rain-head shower and full sized bath and heated towel rack. Other features include bamboo floors, 6 sea- dining room, awesome couch (you won't want to get off it!), TV, stereo, DVD's and internal laundry with washing machine and portable washing line on the balcony. Location We are located in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney on Alison Road in Kensington which is approx 4 kms to the Sydney CBD. The flat is centrally located and within walking distance
neighborhood_overview: Kensington is a lovely little suburb. It is very safe area. There are many food options within walking distance on Anzac Parade such as Thai, Mexican, Indonesian and Italian.  Plus a lovely cafe called Cafe Jacks that has good coffee and good options for breakfast and lunch. Two blocks walk away is the foodie haven of Danks Street Waterloo where you can have your pick of many restaurants and do your grocery shopping.  The cool area of Surry Hills is also 5 minutes away by bus, Surry Hills also has great restaurants and bars our favourite is Vascos bar and the Clock Hotel- for good pub grub. This area also has a number of designer clothes and jewellery shops.  On Crown st is Messinas the best ice cream shop in Australia!  5 minutes by bus or car and a 15-20 minute walk is Randwick Spot, where  you will be spoilt for choice of restaurants. There is also a  movie cinema- Randwick Ritz and a and a few cool small bars, our top pic is Bat Country right opposite the cinemas.
notes: We would appreciate contacting us via airbnb before making a request.  If you have children then it is your responsibility to ensure their safety at all times in the flat.
transit: The flat is on a major bus transport line and busses come very 2-5 minutes. There are bus stops on both Anzac and the corner of Alison and Doncaster Roads. It is a 7-10 minute bus ride to Central station and 15 mins to Coogee Beach via Randwick. It takes between 20-25 (depending on traffic) minutes to get to Circular Quay- where you can see the Harbour Bridge and Opera House!
access: Price includes unlimited WIFI broadband internet. Also includes all linen and towels and use of all the pots, pans, plates etc in the kitchen. Fresh herbs We have a small balcony that overlooks centennial park feel free to sit out there and have your breakfast whilst listening to the birds in the trees.
interaction: My husband (John) or I will welcome you to the flat and take you through all you need to know for a great holiday.  We will happy to field any questions you might have.
house_rules: We ask that you keep the place neat and tidy. By all means have a fun time, but please respect our neighbours by not having the music up too loud, slamming security door or walking in high heels.   There is to be no smoking inside the flat and please don't ash in our herb garden. We would really appreciate if you could water the plants if you are staying for more than 1 week.
host_about:
I am a  fun loving person with a taste for travel and adventure. I like to travel off the beaten path which has taken me to some amazing destinations. I am passionate about nature and find myself more at home in a rainforest then in the city. I love to garden and we have a small balcony garden with a green wall and lots of herbs to add that extra spice to cooking.

The apartment reflects my partner and I laid back style with all the comforts that you will have at home. I will go out of my way to help you during your stay and ensure its clean to a very high standard. We hope that you enjoy your stay.

name: Bright, modern luxury apartment in prime location
summary: Sydney Harbour views, sun drenched balconies and a stroll to famous Bondi Beach - our home is the perfect year-round entertainer and is now available during the prime New Years period... be quick! Modern furnishings and comfortable amenities make this is a unique property so close to the city and beach with excellent, popular local restaurants. Suits young family.
space: Generous bedrooms, large living area, friendly neighbors, quiet building with all modern services including wi-fi, gas cooking surfaces, Nespresso machine, 55" TV, Airplay sound system! We're a 5 minute stroll to popular cafes, the Beach Road Hotel, Harris Farm Markets and the bustling Hall St. A further 3 minute walk to Bondi Beach. Entire home recarpeted, fresh paint and new block out curtains. Call/email if you need anything.

The building has a large private pool that is perfect for kids, well maintained and hardly used. (The
neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach, Australia's most famous beach is an eight minute walk. On the way there you'll walk down the bustling Hall St with top restaurants, trendy cafes, wine bars, live music and the buzz of arguably Sydney's hottest spot during the summer.
notes: We would prefer a longer stay with couples or families applying.
transit: Regular bus services operate to Bondi Junction for train and bus connections to the city, airport and beyond. The 379 stops at the end of the street and the 380 and 333 go to the city. The Rose Bay ferry wharf is a 25 minute walk for a unique trip to the Circular Quay in the heart of the city. Dockless bikes and Uber/GoCatch operates in Sydney.
access: Our entire home, two bedrooms, two bathrooms and off street security garage plus visitor parking. The building has a large private pool that is perfect for kids, well maintained and hardly used. (The third bedroom with our baby cot will be closed off)
interaction: We would like to speak with you beforehand just to confirm you’re not hosting a huge party for NYE but we're always available on mobile phone if needed.
house_rules: Strictly no pets and no smoking. Have as much fun as you can, but respect it is our home. Our neighbours are all lovely people, so please be nice and welcoming.
host_about:
We are a recently-married couple living the dream in Bondi Beach before children come along. We are passionate about the outdoors, good music (have a play on our piano) and great wine (although the wine fridge is off-limits!).
 
We hope you care for our home as much as we do.

name: Bondi Garden Apartment
summary: Peaceful and private renovated one-bedroom garden flat in North Bondi. More like a house than a flat. All modern conveniences including dishwasher, washing machine, BBQ and two unisex beach cruiser bikes. Situated on a cul de sac with unlimited free parking. The beach is a 5-minute bike ride away or 10-minute stroll. Pet friendly and available for long term bookings.
space: Welcome! The Apartment I have a one-bedroom art deco garden apartment in North Bondi. It has white-washed wooden floors, high ceilings, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a garden with lawn, fenced for a pet.  Free wifi available. The sofa converts to a double bed. There is also:   TV   DVD   Washing machine   Dishwasher   Microwave   Kitchen fully equipped   Quality linen & beach towels   Plenty of storage   All natural bathroom products Small-pet friendly. Suit couple with child (not subject to an extra charge). Portable cot and high chair available for a small extra charge.  Location It's an easy 5 minute walk to the supermarket and the many shops, cafes and restaurants of Bondi, including my favourite local cafe, the Organic Republic Bakery.  Additionally its only a ten minute walk to the beach! Public Transport The bus stop with regular buses to Bondi Junction is less than a minute away. Bondi Junction has a huge shopping mall (the biggest in the Southern Hemisph

neighborhood_overview: North Bondi is the quieter end of Bondi where you won't be woken by drunken pub goers. The flat is a short stroll to several good bakery cafes both in Rose Bay and North Bondi. It is also a stroll away from the hub if Bondi Beach where there are hip cafes, small bars and restaurants. At the front of the building, on the opposite side of the road, you'll find a bike/walking path that will take you to Rose bay which includes a tour past one of Sydney's best golf clubs. Rose Bay beach (at the end of O'Sullivan Rd) is dog friendly.
notes: The garden is common property but with the exception of another resident's dog, which visits occassionally, it is not used by others.
transit: The bus stop is a minute away on the corner and it will take you to Bondi Junction and from there you can catch a train to the city. The bicycles supplied can take you on longer trips around the neighbourhood and help you avoid car parking issues that occur on weekends in summer time. It's also a short distance to the less busy eastern suburb harbour beaches.
access: I am not currently occupying the flat so there are no personal belongings of mine to work around.
interaction: I don't live on the property.
house_rules: No smoking inside.
host_about: I like furry friends and stylish surrounds.

name: Bondi Beauty - 400m to Bondi Beach!
space: Our light, spacious, and modern apartment is the perfect base to experience all the Bondi lifestyle has to offer. You will be just 400m to the famous beach itself and 2 minutes walk to of all the best cafes and bars in Bondi. This location simply cannot be beaten!  Literally 2 minutes down the road you will find the famous Organic Bakery, a supermarket and easy transport to Bondi Junction and the city (if you can drag yourself away from Bondi that is!). You will also be just moments walk to Gould Street boutique shopping where you can also go to Sonoma bread, Miss Chu, Gusto cafe and Ravesis. Just around the corner in the other direction are the renowned cafe/restaurants Brown Sugar, Deli Bottega and Speakeasy bar. On Saturdays there is the Bondi Beach farmers market at the end of your road and on Sundays the clothes and crafts market in the same spot. So many places to go and all within an easy walk from your Bondi base!  Our apartment has one large, sundrenched bedroom with a comfort

When you leave: - strip the beds and put bedding and towels into the laundry - take away or throw away any food you brought with you - take your rubbish down and put in the communal bins - put any dirty dishes in the dishwasher and turn it on
host_about:
We are from Sydney and live in Bondi Beach. We are really into our sport (especially triathlon and surfing) and are quiet and careful people. 

We love Bondi for its amazing beach, fantastic cafes and restaurants, and chilled out vibe. But we also love to travel, and especially meeting the locals and going to their favourite spots.

name: Position Position - Wilson St - Pet Friendly
summary: Cute and comfy garden apartment right in the middle of Newtown - pet friendly, parking at the door. King street with buses to the city is only two minutes walk and the railway 5 minutes easy walk. We are at the rear of the building, Retro older style but very convenient and very comfortable
space: Welcome to Newtown! Fantastic Location, Amazing Space! Converted Druids Hall, the space is now a funky apartment in the center of vibrant Newtown. We are located just five minutes to the city. It is the perfect location for you to base yourself at while you explore the surrounding areas.  About Newtown: Newtown is both colorful and unconventional. There are many inner-city attractions with an abundance of restaurants and bars. There are also a variety of specialist shops which include vintage fashion, music stores, bookshops, antique stores, hairdressing salons and home ware shops. With more than over 100 restaurants and cafes, you are guaranteed to find something to fulfill your taste buds. If you are into live music, why not catch a gig at the nearby iconic Enmore Theatre or wander the streets and take in the overall vibe of what this trendy suburb has to offer.

notes: 131500 transport infoline will give you all the public transport options. You will need an Opal card – they are available from the railway station, the cards are free and you top them up. If you are Australian and a senior it is worth applying for a seniors one online before your stay.  If coming from the airport Uber is not much more than the train, especially if 2 people its actually cheaper. We are only a 10ish minute drive from the airport.
transit: only a minute to the bus- a few minutes to the train
access: Entire self contained apartment
interaction: I'm only an SMS away

name: 3 Bedroom Apartment at Coogee Beach
summary: Our semi is really close to Coogee Beach, has three big bedrooms and will give you a great base from which to explore Sydney. Suitable for couples, groups of friends or families.
space: Bright and sunny, in the heart of Coogee! Welcome to beautiful Coogee Beach in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs, 8 kilometres from Sydney's CBD. Available is the entire street level of my large semi-detached house in a great spot at Coogee beach, with private entrance at street level. Marble fireplaces, solid bamboo floors and pressed tin ceilings grace this 100 year old home. The private apartment has three big bedrooms: One with a queen bed and built-in wardrobe; One with a queen bed; and One with 2 hotel king singles (which zip together to form one king bed) and built-in wardrobe. There are reverse cycle air conditioners and ceiling fans in all of the bedrooms and the living room, so the place is the perfect temperature all year round. There's free wifi, 3 TVs with Netflix and Fetch TV (in lounge room and two bedrooms), open plan kitchen and I'll even leave you a nice bottle of Aussie wine to get things started. The kitchen is pretty well stocked - sugar, oil, baking paper, flour, foil, but

There's free wifi, 3 TVs with Netflix and Fetch TV (in lounge room and two bedro
neighborhood_overview: Coogee is an awesome suburb, close to the Sydney CBD but with a great village feel. There are heaps of cafes, restaurants and bars near the house, and the beach is beautiful.
transit: Street parking is available, but most guests find that taking a bus is easier to get into the city, and most other things are in walking distance. There are bus stops very close to the house, including an express service to the CBD. Coogee is really well serviced by uber (we never have to wait more than a minute or 2) so I strongly recommend that over renting a car. If you're going to take the kids to the zoo or Luna Park, take the ferry! It's worth it for the views of Sydney Harbour. If you have a car please ensure you park in the unrestricted spots on the street. There are also a few goget carshare cars near the house - one is only a block away in a dedicated spot.
access: Guests have sole access to the apartment, and no facilities are shared with anyone else.
interaction: We live near by and are available to give you a quick rundown of the place, where stuff is, etc if you need, otherwise we leave you alone! If you need anything during your stay all you need to do is call or shoot me an email and I'll sort it out.
house_rules: The usual - have fun and please respect the house and neighbours. No parties please.
host_about: Hi! I'm Rohan, a teacher and writer. My wife and I would like to spend time each year experiencing a new city in a new country.

name: The little Manly getaway :)
space: Welcome to Manly and Sydney's Northern Beaches! This studio apartment is on the ground floor (pool level), located on Manly's prestigious Addison Road.  Located only a short walk to Manly Beach, Manly Wharf and Manly's shopping street The Corso.  This studio apartment comes fully furnished, with an open plan living style with the kitchen and bathroom separate to the bedroom & living space. The apartment has a queen size bed and can cater to up to 3 people with the use of a fold out single bed upon request.  The bathroom has been recently renovated with tiling and new cabinets and fixtures, and the kitchen has all the appliances you could possibly need to cook up a little feast.  The living area has a large LCD TV and DVD player to relax and watch your favourite DVD's.  The street is quiet and leafy. A laundromat, restaurant and convenience store are located right outside this block, very convenient during your stay!

name: Newport Beach Sydney Ocean View
summary: A generous one bedroom unit with private access overlooking Newport Beach. Outdoor terrace and gas barbeque, kitchenette, living area and bathroom.
space: A generous, self contained one bedroom unit overlooking Newport Beach, with outdoor terrace and gas barbeque! Bright and sunny with modern furnishing, the apartment, which is the ground floor of the owner's residence with private entrance, sleeps two in a separate bedroom with queen size bed. There is a modern bathroom with shower, wc, vanity basin, heater and heated towel rail. There is also a kitchenette with full size refrigerator, microwave, electric hotplate, electric kettle, toaster and coffee maker. Instant oats, milk, tea and coffee (Instant & Ground) supplied. The Living room features a flat screen TV, Apple TV (Netflix, Stan, etc) hard disc player and recorder, Bluetooth music (iLink) player, 2.5 seater leather lounge, single lounge chair. Dining table seating 4. There is also Gas heating for those colder months.
description: A generous one bedroom unit with private access overlooking Newport Beach. Outdoor terrace and gas barbeque, kitchenette, living area and bathroom. A generous, self contained one bedroom unit overlooking Newport Beach, with outdoor terrace and gas barbeque! Bright and sunny with modern furnishing, the apartment, which is the ground floor of the owner's residence with private entrance, sleeps two in a separate bedroom with queen size bed. There is a modern bathroom with shower, wc, vanity basin, heater and heated towel rail. There is also a kitchenette with full size refrigerator, microwave, electric hotplate, electric kettle, toaster and coffee maker. Instant oats, milk, tea and coffee (Instant & Ground) supplied. The Living room features a flat screen TV, Apple TV (Netflix, Stan, etc) hard disc player and recorder, Bluetooth music (iLink) player, 2.5 seater leather lounge, single lounge chair. Dining table seating 4. There is also Gas heating for those colder months. Parking
neighborhood_overview: Newport Beach is one of Sydney's premier surfing beaches and is just 10 minutes away accessed by a pathway and stair opposite the apartment.  There are a number of walks around the Crown of the Hill reserve which take you to patches of remnant rainforest and spectacular coastal views.  Newport Village is also nearby and has a number of restaurants of varying price ranges as well as a bar, supermarket, delicatessens and liquor stores. A number of restaurants provide home delivery. Newport is at the start of the Barrenjoey Peninsula which has some of Sydney's finest surfing beaches on the east and Pittwater, a sailor's paradise, to the west. There are several nearby golf courses and tennis courts for hire. "The Newport", Justin Hemmes recent upgrade of the famous "Newport Arms Hotel" is 5 min. by car or a 20 min. walk away. Set on the stunning shores of Pittwater, it is a vibrant gathering place for all ages. Nestled amongst idyllic gardens, and incorporating various outdoor dining space
notes: 2 night minimum December and January
transit: Buses are available from the beach accessing Palm Beach to the north and the Sydney CBD to the south
access: Parking is available adjacent to the apartment at the top of the driveway with generally level access. ( 1 small step). Please park over to the left up near the garbage bins to allow access to the garage. Access to the apartment is via the sliding door to the right side of the ground floor terrace. The key is located in a Masterlock Key Safe on the verandah post adjacent to the barbeque. You will be given the combination on prior to arrival.
interaction: We are happy to provide any assistance or advice if required. Otherwise we will leave you alone.
house_rules: Smoking within the unit and pets not permitted. Please remove all sand before entering unit.
host_about: We are married couple who love living on the northern beaches and look forward to sharing this wonderful part of Sydney with you.  Malcolm is an Architect with his own practice and Ann-Maree is an active member of Bayview Golf Club. We enjoy travel, theatre, art, good wine and food

name: Walk to Bondi Beach apartment!
summary: A fabulous 2 rooms self contained apartment close to Bondi Beach.
space: Welcome to the magic of North Bondi and thank you for checking this listing!  The apartment:  Come stay and enjoy our one bedroom, self contained and fully furnished apartment only 1500 metres away from Sydney's most famous Bondi Beach!  The house offers everything you need to have a great stay including:  - TV/DVD, washer/dryer - comfortable living room with a double sofa - cosy bedroom with a queen bed and a wall-to-wall built in wardrobe.  - well-equipped kitchennette  - stylish bathroom with a full size bath.  The apartment is beautifully presented and creates the feeling of a quiet oasis.  The area:  You will enjoy a very convenient location within walking distance to the buzz of night life and surf. Bondi has a vibe you should experience for yourself. The mix of surfers, backpackers and locals creates an unique and vibrant atmosphere! neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is the most famous beach in Australia and it is close to our home, yet we live on a quiet residential street. You could have all the comforts of home being in the most desirable location. Fabulous coast walks, ocean swimming,  best cafés and restaurants and the vibrant Sydney's night life close by. We are 15-20 mins car ride from the city centre with all the theaters, museums, Harbour Bridge, and the easy access to Central Station's trains to take you to Blue mountains or Central Coast. Welcome!
notes: In December-January our rent is AU$150 per night and a minimal stay is 1 week.
transit: 389 bus will take you to Bondi Junction or CBD. There is a train and bus stations at Bindi Junction. We are a short walk from the beach, 5-7 km to Opera House and half an hour taxi rude from the airport.
access: Apartment is a fully self contained with 2 rooms and a full bathroom featuring a bath tub. There is a fully equipped kitchenette and an off street car park in front of the house for our guests' use. Wi-fi and laundry facilities.
interaction: We prefer our guests to have their privacy and only see us when they choose to do so :-)

name: 1BR in B&B beautiful Cremorne home!
summary: Welcome to the stunning area of Cremorne and thank you for checking this listing!  Stay with some real Sydney siders in my modern friendly family home ideally located in a quiet street just 4 km from Sydney city centre!  This home is a fantastic base for a Sydney holiday, business, travel or study. I have two rooms available for guests, please see additional listing in AIRBNB if you need another room for friends or family. .
space: Welcome to the stunning area of Cremorne and thank you for checking this listing!  Stay with some real Sydney siders in my modern friendly family home ideally located in a quiet street just 4 km from Sydney city centre!  This home is a fantastic base for a Sydney holiday, business, travel or study. The house:  Come stay and enjoy one of our two elegantly decorated guest rooms. The house boasts the luxury of having 2 bathrooms. It has a lovely open plan kitchen and living area that leads to the outdoor dining/ BBQ area, level garden and veranda. My guest rooms have twin beds and can accommodate singles, two friends, couples or family groups.  Wireless internet is available and there is plenty of free street parking. Looking for something unique? You can have breakfast with the cockatoos whilst gazing over the leafy vista of the Cremorne valley! The middle harbour foreshore track around Cremorne and Primrose Park is right accross the road.  Mosman village is a short distance away. Public

neighborhood_overview: Quite leafy area, across the road from a very large harbour front park ideal for walks. Also located on the city link cycle path and guests are welcome to bring their bikes. Otherwise it is a 400 metre walk to regular city or beach buses.
transit: Designated bike/cycle way at door, alternatively 400 metre walk to bus stop, can walk to the city via harbour bridge in about 45 minutes. There is lots of free street parking if you drive or taxis are always available. Reddy GO is a local bike sharing company so it is very easy to rent a bike and pick it up locally, sometimes just out front of the home (gps tracking bikes can be dropped off anywhere just need to download the app). Car sharing is also available locally through GoGet if you need cost effective rental car, can be picked 300 metres up the road.
access: Shared access to living room, kitchen, bathroom, laundry, garden and terrace.
interaction: I am available in house for information and advise.
house_rules: No smoking on the property, this is a shared home, consideration and respect for other guest or residents is required.  No unregistered guests. If you have any question or special requests please ask.
host_about: I am interested in sport, cinema, music, reading, theatre, travel, pets, foreign cultures, photography, gardening, the outdoors, watching movies and documentaries, talking with friends, computer/internet, going to the beach or walking in the mountains.  I try to live everyday in a positive way.
