neighborhood_overview: North Bondi shares Bondi and Bondi Beach’s laid-back attitude, but it differs slightly in manner, in style, and in its suburban sensibilities. This eastern enclave lacks the crowds and the busyness of the rest of Bondi while supporting sustainable farms and local yoga studios. Art Deco facades and ultra-modern designer apartments lend North Bondi a trendier, more exclusive reputation than its southern counterparts, and so does its array of sartorial boutiques and restaurants that name themselves with single syllables.
notes: Please note that a copy of valid photo ID of all adult guests staying is required after booking. The management reserves the right to request for photo IDs of all guests staying for security purposes.  For the home owners security, only guests who are listed on the security form are allowed access to the property. Beautiful private family home, opened up for your family to enjoy Sydney Summer in Bondi !
transit: Please use the app city mapper
access: The whole house is yours to enjoy :) For security purposes, check-in details will be emailed to confirmed guests 2 days before arrival for an easy smooth fast check-in. Kindly make sure you have submitted the security form with all the valid ID's of all adult guests staying so that you receive a seamless check-in experience :) For the home owners security, only guests who are listed on the security form are allowed access to the property.
interaction: We give guests full privacy but are most welcome to reach out as needed.  Simply send a message via the platform you booked. We are also just a phone call away :)
house_rules: • Please remember that if the keys are locked in the apartment at some point of your stay or after check-out, we might need to call a locksmith or have the keys replaced and this will need to be charged to your account. • Please remember that our property is located in a tropical country and therefore some small insects such as mosquitoes and cockroaches are present in the area. We love the warmth of summer and so do these bugs. Be careful with leaving food behind and/or with leaving windows and doors open at night as these critters will find their way in. We do our utmost best to prevent this, but please do not be alarmed if one is sighted and simply inform us and we will make sure we do our best to help you.  • Please respect the 10am check-out time, if our housekeepers are not able to do the cleaning on time, we may need to charge you a delayed entry fee. Please do send us a message if you wish to check out late and we will do our best to help you.  • If you leave any items behind b
host_about:
I am a very easy going, friendly girl who loves to get the best out of life. I love my family and my friends and of course my house. My house is my haven and with the help of a very dear friend its been transformed into the perfect space to come home to every day for me and my family.
I love trying new things and love, i love to travel and love to smile.
I cant live without coffee and chocolate and of course hugs and kisses.
We love having people over as out house is so warm, friendly and inviting and our friends love hanging out here. 
My life motto is " if you dont try you will never know if you can do it".

name: Beachside fam friendly. SEE REVIEWS
summary: Welcome to beautiful Clovelly Beach! Enjoy our sunny, family friendly, furnished 2 brm apartment with balcony only 2 minutes walk from the beach. Short bus or drive to the city. Close to great bars/restaurants/coffee and Sydney's famous beautiful coastal walk!  I'll provide local tips to make the most of your trip! See our REVIEWS!
space: Welcome to Clovelly!  The Apartment: Enjoy our sunny, furnished 2 brm apartment with balcony.  - 2 beds (queen & double) - very comfy!  - 1 large and 1 moderate sized bedroom - Garage (needed near the beach)! - Wireless Internet - TV - Heating or fan - Dishwasher - Laundry (external) -Newly renovated kitchen with induction cooktop and Smeg appliances! - Snorkelling: masks and snorkels for finding the local blue gropers (look up 'Clovelly blue groper')! The apartment offers all you would expect in your own apartment!  We will leave our kitchen and some general things in the apartment, but will clear space for your clothes etc. Will inform you of details to ensure it is exactly as expected. Washer & dryer are shared by 2 others, but you are free to use as much as needed and we will provide detergent. Just 1 minute (200m) walk to beach and stunning coastal walk! notes: Can provide kids equipment or bikes if needed.
transit: A bus from right outside takes you via Central Station into the City to Circular Quay. We have a garage for a car or many beaches Clovelly, Coogee, Bronte, Tamarama and Bondi) are in walking distance.
access: Guests have access to everything except two locked cupboards. Guests have plenty of space in the adjoining cupboards to unpack and feel at home.

host_about:
You'll love our apartment in Clovelly - everyone has so far - check out our reviews! 
As avid travellers from Sydney. We’ve stayed all around the world, recently as Airbnb guests, and know what makes you happy. We treat each guest with respect for their privacy, but will help with tips and are available for any questions you might have.
Start the day like we do along the stunning coastal cliff walk, good coffee or a swim at the beach!

Bus transport at your doorstep and only 30 minutes to CBD, shopping centre across the road and a 10 minute walk to the beach, airport 12 mins.

name: Double Room, Bondi Junction, Sydney.
summary: My flat is in a really handy location to get to everywhere on foot and public transport - no car required. The front door is downstairs from the street, so the flat stays cool in summer, and opening the back door to the sunny shared garden can be quite a surprise!
space: Welcome to Bondi Junction!  Come and enjoy a double bedroom in my 2 bedroomed garden flat.  Make use of the fully equipped kitchen (newly fitted in June 2017). The kitchen, bathroom and living room will be shared with 1-2 other people but you will have it to yourself most of the time. In addition the apartment offers:  - TV and DVD players in bedroom and living room - Washer in outhouse and drying green - quiet and secluded outside area - accessed from my back door, shared by 6 flats, but very rarely used by them except to dry clothes. Please take notice Short lets only - up to 2 weeks. The area: The Junction offers everything you can think of. The massive Westfield Shopping Centre offers many shops, supermarkets, a  multi screen cinema and coffee shops.  You can walk to Centennial park which offers beautiful walking routes, bicycles to hire and where you can feed the birds in the ponds!  You can also walk to the famous Bondi Beach in less than 30 minutes - all downhill, or get one of

The front door is downstairs from the street, so the flat stays cool in summer, and opening the back door to the sunny shared garden can be quite a surprise! Welcome to Bondi Junction!  Come and enjoy a double bedroom in my 2 bedroomed garden flat.  Make use of the fully equipped kitchen (newly fitted in June 2017). The kitchen, bathroom and living room will be shared with 1-2 other people but you will have it to yourself most of the time. In addition the apartment offers:  - TV and DVD players in bedroom and living room - Washer in outhouse and drying green - quiet and secluded outside area - accessed from my back door, shared by 6 flats, but very rarely used by them except to dry clothes. neighborhood_overview: So many cafes in Bondi Junction with great coffee, supermarkets a short walk away, beaches, city, the bush...all very accessible.
notes: My place is a basement flat (although not underground at all!), so stays nice and cool when its hot outside.
transit: Only about 20 minutes to the CBD (Opera House, Harbour Bridge, China Town, The Rocks) by bus or train. Public transport runs very regularly, day and night. A service bus(number 400) from the airport to Bondi Junction costs less than $5. Walk to Bondi or Bronte Beach in less than 30 minutes, or hop on one of many buses and be there in 10. If you like to be out in the Bush, the Royal National Park to the south and Kuringi to the north are about one hour away on the train. 2 hours to the Blue mountains or Kiama by train too. Cars can be a bit of a nuisance in Sydney as parking is hard to find and can be expensive. In my street, from 8am-6pm Monday-Saturday, parking is restricted to one hour. Its unlimited otherwise. There are other streets in the area where parking is not restricted, so you may have to drive round a bit to find a spot.
access: Kitchen,livingroom,shared garden area, shower/bath/toilet.
interaction: I work full time (shift work), and when I am at work have no access to phone or wifi. I am also away a lot, so guests have the place to themselves frequently. However, I am very happy to offer advice and answer any questions guests have when I am around or after work by email, text or in person.
house_rules: No real rules, but it is a residential area, so quiet guests appreciated - and no late night visitors. No smoking in the house, but smoking in the back garden is fine.
host_location: Bondi Junction, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
Come stay at Bondi Junction and enjoy a lovely double bedroom, sharing the flat with me. I work shifts, and am away a lot, so you'll likely have the place to yourself quite a bit.
I have had great airbnb experiences, both as a host and guest, and l hope l can help you to have the best time in Sydney. Close to public transport to go anywhere, or if you prefer to relax at home, plenty of books and dvds you can borrow, and you have full use of the kitchen. I also house swap regularly.

name: Lovely large family home in Pymble
summary: Spacious indoors and out for a large family or two families. Large main bedroom with ensuite, 3 other bedrooms (2 singles and 1 double). New bathrooms, 2 separate living spaces (or one can be used as bedroom with double comfy sofa bed. Modern kitchen, 2 meals area (dining and open lounge/dining from kitchen. Huge deck with shade and sun options (dining and lounge area). Large secure backyard with solar heated pool with water feature. Walk to local shops, aquatic centre, tennis courts, park.
space: Family home in Pymble on the North Shore of Sydney, very leafy, beautiful suburb. Sleeps family/group of 6-8 in 4 bedrooms (2 double bedrooms, 2 single bedrooms and a 2nd lounge that can be used on sofa bed as extra double bedroom - sealed off) Has solar heated pool, large 60 sq ft deck (with shade, sun and lounges), pool, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, 5-7 min walk to local shops (including restaurants, mini supermarket, fitness/pool centre) and 4 parks.  Walk to chinese, italian (2), pizza restaurants, plus 2 great indoor/outdoor cafes for breaky or 5 mins bus to many more. Very leafy suburb, close to all amenities.  Walk to station (20-25 mins) or bus to station takes 5 mins (end of street-2 mins walk) Train is 30 mins to city or 15 mins to Chatswood and Hornsby shopping districts. 5 mins bus to Macquarie Shopping Centre (indoor ice skating, cinemas, restaurants and lots of large/small shops) Loads of space, modern /renovated living spaces and huge covered and not covered deck overlooking
description: Spacious indoors and out for a large family or two families. Large main bedroom with ensuite, 3 other bedrooms (2 singles and 1 double). Huge deck with shade and sun options (dining and lounge area). Large secure backyard with solar heated pool with water feature. Walk to local shops, aquatic centre, tennis courts, park. Walk to chinese, italian (2), pizza restaurants, p
neighborhood_overview: Walk to 3 parks, tennis courts, local shops and restaurants (pizza, italian, chinese, bakery, small supermarket, butcher, cafes).  3 mins walk to bus to station, then 30 mins on train to city 30 mins drive to beaches (or bus option) 10 mins drive to large shopping centre Very leafy area with lovely houses, well paved walkways.
transit: Plenty of parking 2-4 cars on the property (plus street) 3 min walk to bus stop (to large shopping centre- 10 mins, train station 8 min- then city 30 mins by train Beach bus 45 mins (from local stop) or 30 min drive Walk to all local shops, restaurants, basics, cafe, newsagency
access: Guests can access the entire house (except the office). We live there but have another house as well so move there when our place is rented. There is a self contained apartment on the property as well - they use one carport and completely separate entry. There are 2 carports for the main house.
interaction: I'm usually only a phone call away (and often just 30 mins drive away if needed).
host_about: We are a family of 4, living on the North Shore in Sydney in a beautiful, bushy suburban area, close to lots of amenities likes parks, pools, shops and buses/trains. We have a large house with 4 bedrooms and a winter lounge (with double sofa), plus a study and large yard and deck and solar heated pool. We love it here, but we also love travelling.

name: Bondi, Bondi Beach, Apartment
summary: We have a gorgeous apartment in the heart of Bondi Beach near the best cafes and just a 2 minute walk to the beach. Soak up the Bondi lifestyle or jump on a bus to the Sydney Opera house and Harbour Bridge. Life doesn't get better than this!
space: Our Home: Bondi Beach Pad, 2br, gorgeous, bright, renovated, open plan, 2min walk to beach, 1 bathroom, built-in laundry. Beautifully renovated 2br Bondi Beach apartment moments to the beach and cafes. In the best part of Bondi, quiet at night but on the beach side of Jeds, the organic bakery cafe and Beach Road Hotel. Large open plan living area, floorboards, light & bright, dishwasher (whisper quiet), internal laundry. Huge lovely shared garden the size of a tennis court with gazebo BBQ entertaining area, hardwood furniture and gas BBQ. 2 huge bedrooms, main with built in wardrobes and walk in, great neighbours and area. Our Neighborhood: Bondi Beach is one of the world's most famous beaches. Bondi Beach is as much a lifestyle choice as a place. Bondi Beach draws the visitor, captivates them and forges memories of sun, surf and sand. It is a slower, sun-warmed world that stands a little apart from our busy lives. name: Paris End Potts Point HARBOUR VIEW!
summary: I recently upgraded the apartment with a brand new AC unit, queen bed, table, 2 chairs, ottoman, wardrobe, upgraded lighting, ceiling fan, side table, and Nespresso machine. I hope you enjoy the new upgrades. Enjoy your stay! Parking is one hour street parking only. There is 4 hour street parking available nearby on Victoria Street thats all we can provide.  There is not an elevator, you will need to walk up two flights.
space: Welcome to Potts Point! This apartment open plan studio has a balcony with a view to Sydney Harbour, and every time you leave the apartment you will see the top of the Sydney Opera House and the Harbour Bridge! Located in the "Paris End" of Potts Point, you can walk to the world class restaurants of Finger Wharf, or up the street to amazing bars and eateries. Go for a jog to the Boy Charlton swimming pool which hangs over the harbour, or stroll to the Botanic Gardens and stop at the magnificent Art Gallery of NSW.  Easy walking access to the train station and bus stop, and taxis are easy to find. The bus to the city is just across the road. The train station is a 10 min walk and from there you can catch a train to Central and change to catch the airport train to the domestic or international airport. Taxis and Uber’s are frequent outside the apartment too. The apartment has tv and wifi internet. There is a queen bed in a nook, a shower bathroom, two arm chairs, and a small table. There

access: Guests are most welcome to enjoy the entire property. For the home owners security, only guests who are listed on the security form are allowed access to the property.
interaction: We give guests full privacy but are most welcome to reach out.  Simply send us a message via the channel where you booked as we have a 100% response rate.  Otherwise, we are just a phone call away too :
house_rules: • Please remember that if the keys are locked in the apartment at some point of your stay or after check-out, we might need to call a locksmith or have the keys replaced and this will need to be charged to your account. • Please remember that our property is located in a tropical country and therefore some small insects such as mosquitoes and cockroaches are present in the area. We love the warmth of summer and so do these bugs. Be careful with leaving food behind and/or with leaving windows and doors open at night as these critters will find their way in. We do our utmost best to prevent this, but please do not be alarmed if one is sighted and simply inform us and we will make sure we do our best to help you.  • Please respect the 10am check-out time, if our housekeepers are not able to do the cleaning on time, we may need to charge you a delayed entry fee. Please do send us a message if you wish to check out late and we will do our best to help you.  • If you leave any items behind b
host_about:
Hello, my name is Gabriel, I work closely with Airbnb and know what it takes to have guests get the best out of their stay. Being in this industry for many years, I've hosted thousands of guests/friends from all over the globe.
Whether you are here for travel, business or making a booking for your family, you can be assured to have a wonderful stay !

name: Sky Loft by Contemporary Hotels
summary: Sky Loft is one of Sydney's most prestigious and unique apartments, with upmost luxury and world class views. Sky Loft sleeps 6 guests in three rooms and across the hall we have Sky Pad which sleeps 2 - this is why it is listed as accommodating 8 (guests need to inquire for Sky Pad before booking to ensure its availability as Sky Pad doesn't come with Sky Loft automatically).
space: ***EXTREMLY STRICT NO PARTY POLICY*** Sky Loft sub-penthouse, situated in Sydney’s desirable Darlinghurst, is the ideal short-term rental or long-term accommodation for those who lust after the excitement, convenience and luxury of city life. Established as a fully furnished three-bedroom apartment, this property is suitable for both the single guest as well as a family.   Sky Loft is swallowed by the eccentric vibes radiated off its lively Victoria St address. From the balcony, an aroma of freshly grounded coffee beans pleasantly congests the air from the wide selection of fabulous cafes. The Darlo’ nightlife beckons you to an experience of fine dining restaurants and the slickest cocktail bars in town. Meander down Victoria St to Li'l Darlin to try one of their irresistible Lychee Martinis or stroll directly across the road to indulge in Portuguese tarts and home-made Italian sandwiches at our favourite café, Latteria or chill out in the brand new hot spot Jekyll & Hyde Coffee and Wi

interaction: 100% Hospitality. We have a caretaker or concierge for all of our properties who will greet all guests on arrival, he/she can be reached by phone throughout the stay.

Bookings: To finalise all bookings this agreement we must follow security procedures and have the agreement acknowledged and returned also before final confirmation. We also take a $2000 bond on your credit card as security as well. Guest numbers: See property information for maximum guest numbers, a full guest list must be provided. Not to be exceeded. Contemporary Hotels Terms and Conditions Contemporary Hotels – Holiday Letting agreement NOTE: Contemporary Hotels follows International best practice policies to ensure the properties we represent for short term accommodation are safe, secure and protected – and not damaged. As these properties are not in commercial areas Australian government regulators and Councils also have strict rules and r
host_about:
Contemporary Hotels is Australia's leading independent boutique accommodation provider well known for its design-conscious Beach Houses + Villas + Luxury Houses + Apartments - as well as its landmark urban boutique hotel Medusa in Sydney. The collection also encompasses a suite of luxury properties on Italy's Amalfi Coast, a sumptuous villa in Bali and a beautiful apartment in Paris.
Contemporary Hotels is the destination of choice by urban sophisticates, professionals, couples and well-travelled families looking for unique contemporary accommodation that celebrates Australia's style. We focus on providing unparalleled service, attention to detail with our properties and ensuring that you, the guest, has a wonderful holiday!

name: Bondi Beach apartment
summary: Spacious deco style apartment with high ceilings and beautiful ornate detail throughout. The large living room opens out into a bright sunroom with ocean glimpse's and district views, it’s lovely, light & the perfect place to lounge on the daybed. The sunroom can also be used as a third bedroom with a single comfortable daybed. There are two double bedrooms with cosy wool carpets and built in wardrobe's.  It’s a great apartment and we hope you love our home as much as we do!
space: The location is what really attracted us to this place, its a 5/10 minute stroll to the beach and a stones throw from some great bars and cafes there's also a bus stop no more than 100 meters away. The apartment itself has classic art deco features with grand high ceilings and ornate details throughout with a total of 108 square meters. Has a light airy feel with a sun room that has ocean views.  The apartment  can accommodate families or couples and is nicely furnished with fresh sheets and towels provided.  We can provide 1 car space if requested in advance.

house_rules: Kitchen access is allowed for tea and coffee, store food in the fridge and consume your meal. However, cooking is not allowed.  If you have any question on this topic, please feel you free to send me a question.
host_about:
My girlfriend and I live together, we love to have in our space people from all over the world. We respect our guess privacy, and our work keeps us pretty busy too!
She is a lovely Australian girl, grew up in Tasmania, just turned 40 years old and works in the financial services industry.
I was born in Europe and moved to Australia in 2006. I am in about to turn 40 too and have my own business, I am in the financial services industry too. I love the life balance offered by my profession: flexible time and working from home anytime I wish.
We love to go to the movies and being in nature, especially at beach. We regularly exercise: gym, swimming and yoga. We love good food, even though We do not cook much, often eating outside. 
We look forward to meeting you.

name: Balmain East Charm
summary: This delightful first floor apartment is just what you need for a month, a week or just a few days in Sydney. Just a few minutes walk to the ferry, the bus into the city and the beautiful waterfront parks.
space: Our apartment has a queen bed in the bedroom and all  linen and towels are provided. There is also parking available. You may want to spend a moment sitting on the balcony admiring  the Harbour Bridge views but my guess is you will want to jump straight onto one of the passing ferries and explore Sydney and our wonderful harbour.
description: This delightful first floor apartment is just what you need for a month, a week or just a few days in Sydney. Just a few minutes walk to the ferry, the bus into the city and the beautiful waterfront parks. Our apartment has a queen bed in the bedroom and all  linen and towels are provided. There is also parking available. You may want to spend a moment sitting on the balcony admiring  the Harbour Bridge views but my guess is you will want to jump straight onto one of the passing ferries and explore Sydney and our wonderful harbour. We will always be there to greet you and unless you are catching a very early flight we will farewell you. There are restaurants, cafes and shops all along Darling Street and a great pub just minutes away.  One of our favourite activities is to pack a picnic and take it to one of the nearby waterfront parks. The views are wonderful and there is always something happening on the Harbour. The East Balmain ferry wharf is just 5 minutes walk from our place and t
neighborhood_overview: There are restaurants, cafes and shops all along Darling Street and a great pub just minutes away.  One of our favourite activities is to pack a picnic and take it to one of the nearby waterfront parks. The views are wonderful and there is always something happening on the Harbour.
transit: The East Balmain ferry wharf is just 5 minutes walk from our place and the bus into the city leaves from the end of the street.  We do have parking if you bring your car but it is far more fun to use public transport from here.
interaction: We will always be there to greet you and unless you are catching a very early flight we will farewell you.
house_rules: Our apartment is on the first floor of one of the earliest buildings in Balmain. It has lovely high ceilings and a sense of bygone days despite the modern kitchen and more contemporary furnishings. There is a coin operated laundry with a washer and dryer at the back of the building which we share with the others.  This is not a high tech ultra-modern pad. It is quaint and quiet and will suit those of you looking for an opportunity to experience the culture of East Balmain. Our apartment is unique and in a very special building and as such we cannot permit any smoking either inside or outside on our balcony.
host_about: We are inveterate travellers who love meeting other travellers and we delight in introducing Balmain (and Sydney) to guests from interstate and overseas.

name: Walk to Harbor Bridge, Lux 3BD House
summary: Superbly located 3 BR modern townhouse in Crows Nest close to CBD. Just three minutes drive from the Harbor Bridge.  Sunny, quiet, beautifully furnished family home.  The house is less than a five minute walk to brand new Woolworth's supermarket, organic food shops, tons of specialty stores, restaurants, bars, cafes, day spas, and more.   Bus stops for buses going all over town and two train stations just minutes walking from the house.  Very comfortably houses six adults. Child friendly.
space: Luxury 3 Bedroom townhouse. Light & bright, with timber floors, modern all mod-con kitchen, private timber courtyard with evening mood lighting, two bathrooms and extra WC. Whisper quiet, yet in a super central location.  Sleeps six, all in proper beds. Child friendly, but keep in mind its three floors and we have no safety gates!  We're often away for weekends, so please do enquire about those as well! On the ground floor are the kitchen, the dining area and the living room which opens with bi-fold doors out onto private courtyard with night time mood lighting for inside/outside living - perfect family entertaining. A very large retractable awning covers the entire courtyard if desired.   Gourmet kitchen with all modern appliances for the enthusiastic chef. Highland cooktop and NEFF oven. Microwave, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, toaster, slow-cooker, juicer, electric kettle, all manner of crockery, kitchen and glass  ware. There's also a guest powder room on this level. The house is No

The house is less than a five minute walk to brand new Woolworth's supermarket, organic food shops, tons of specialty stores, restaurants, bars, cafes, day spas, and more.   Bus stops for buses going all over town and two train stations just minutes walking from the house.  Very comfortably houses six adults. Child friendly. Luxury 3 Bedroom townhouse. Light & bright, with timber floors, modern all mod-con kitchen, private timber courtyard with evening mood lighting, two bathrooms and extra WC. Whisper quiet, yet in a super central location. On the ground floor are the kitchen, the dining area and the living room which opens with bi-fold d
neighborhood_overview: Crows Nest is an upmarket suburb of Sydney. Tons of cafes, restaurants, grocery stores including a brand new Woolworths and an organic food store are just a stone's throw away from the house. Bottle shops, bars, parks, fresh produce markets every weekend, beauty salons, hospitals, butchers, bakers, candle stick makers, and other specialty stores. All just minutes walk from our house. Very short walking distance to public transport (bus and rail) going all over Sydney.
notes: Absolutely no parties, no smoking, no loud music and no guests other than those booked to stay may come into the house.  The house is suitable for responsible adults / families.  Sorry, but the house is not suitable for raucous youngsters travelling in a group.
transit: Public buses departing to places all over Sydney from bus stops just minutes walk from the house. Plus two railway stations with trains going north or to the center of Sydney at ten minute walks away. SUPER convenient to public transport. Taxis are a cinch to catch just 50m from the house.
access: The whole house. Apple TV comes with Netflix. Please Note: Free Wifi for is available up to a max of 500MB per stay. If more data is required, please advise before arrival. It is available @$A8.00 per 500MB Access to a private remote controlled parking space can be arranged upon request.
interaction: Via sms text / talking by phone or by email if necessary during your stay. We only rent out our family home when we ourselves are away, so we aren't around.  Ask me for recommendations and tips. I'm very happy to help you with inside info where I can.
house_rules: NO smoking, No parties, NO loud music, NO pets.  Departure - the property should be left in a similar state to its condition on arrival.  Garbage and recyclables should be disposed of in the "garbage room". No refuse whatsoever is to be left in the house upon departure. Disturbance to our neighbours, including excessive noise, is strictly prohibited.  Number of people in the house at any time must not exceed the number stated on the Confirmation Notice. So no guests of guests allowed. This is our family home, we live here all year round. It is not a hotel.  Accordingly, we will only allow people to stay here who we feel will respect our home and treat it and its content with care.  The place is not suitable for youngsters travelling in groups. It is suitable for responsible, considerate and respectful adults and their family / close friends.
host_about:
Hi there. I've lived and worked in many different countries. I work at a Big Four consulting firm in Sydney. 
My motto is: treat others in the way that you would wish to be treated. That also applies to homes :-)

name: Beautiful Water View Entire Apartment
summary: Beautiful Harbour Views from this East Sydney Apartment in one of the most sought after areas in Sydney. Now with unlimited fibre internet and Apple TV.
space: Exquisite Sydney Harbour water views from this bright, tranquil studio in one of the best locations in Sydney -- Elizabeth Bay. Spend the morning by the water or the afternoon lazing in the park -- Located in the coveted Elizabeth Bay "loop", this is the perfect spot for a traveler or longer visitor. Apartment is just a few minutes from the city by taxi ($10), train (station is 3 blocks walk) or bus (right outside the front door!) -- or you can even walk (15-20 mins). Cafés are everywhere in this area and the coffee and food are superb!! Just a short walk to Macleay Street shopping and bars, restaurants, etc .. very convenient for the business traveler. Beautiful trees and a small park opposite the building entrance, or access the water's edge and the enormous Rushcutters Bay park by walking just one block! You'll find Council operated Tennis Courts there as well as amazing Fitness Trainers and a couple of cafés. The apartment has everything you need -- tranquility, serenity, peace --

neighborhood_overview: Elizabeth Bay is a wonderfully unique neighbourhood surrounded by parks and water. Rushcutters Bay is right outside and there's plenty of lifestyle attractions such as friendly cafes & weekly markets.
notes: Hope you enjoy your stay in this terrific spot!
transit: Within just a few metres of the front door of the building you'll find: - A bus stop (city return) - Car Share bays (cars you can rent by the hour online) - Railway / Train station is about 10 minutes walk. - Taxis and übers constantly in the 'loop' road that leads to the door
access: Rooftop Pool Rooftop BBQ Area
interaction: I don't interact with guests unless they need me for any reason. I'm almost always instantly available via the AirBnB messaging service.
house_rules: • Check-in time is usually after 10AM but earlier check-in can sometimes be arranged ahead of time via security code. • Check-out time is 11AM. I ask that you please respect the serenity of this apartment and the apartments around it. The building is generally a very quiet, tranquil place to be. At night all you can hear are the clinking marine stays against the masts of yachts. Please respect my neighbours! If you choose to violate any of the below rules, you will forfeit your deposit and AirBnB may charge an additional fee: No Smoking. No Pets. No Parties. No Film/Photography shoots.
host_location: Elizabeth Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
I'm an Australian professional who spends more time abroad than at home.
I host a water side unit in Sydney's Elizabeth Bay area. When I'm traveling, hotels can only be comfortable for so long and so AirBnB is perfect for me.

name: Linley House Bed & Breakfast
summary: Linley House is bed & breakfast accommodation and the owners live on the premises.  Continental breakfast is included in the cost.  There is free parking and WIFI. There are 3 rooms and prices are for per room and will accommodate two people in each room.  If the calendar shows as available it may mean there is only one room left.
space: We have a contemporary house 8kms from the city opposite Lane Cove River. You can travel to the city by bus from Hunters Hill or by ferry to Circular Quay where you will arrive at the Sydney Opera House and Botanic Gardens The Bed and Breakfast: there are 3 bedrooms available and also a bunk room for children. Two of the bedrooms have sunny views of the river and the garden room has views of the garden. Each room sleeps two people and the cost is per room. i.e. for two people only. The twin/king room can have a king bed or two single beds and the queen room has one queen bed. These two rooms have shared bathroom. The garden room can have either two single beds or a king bed and has ensuite bathroom. - There is free parking - Free WIFI - Airco & heating - Free continental breakfast The calendar is not accurate as being a Bed & Breakfast accommodation we have 3/4 rooms available for different families. Please contact us by email to check availability. Guests may book on

neighborhood_overview: Linley House is a boutique bed and breakfast superbly located near the Lane Cove river.
transit: there is a bus at the door to Chatswood and Gladesville.  It is a 10 minute walk to Hunters Hill where you can catch a bus to the city.  You can catch a bus to Valentia St Woolwich and catch a ferry to Circular Quay near the Sydney Opera House and Botanic Gardens.  There are restaurants 10 minutes walk from the house.
access: You will have access to the dining and loungerooms and beautiful decks
interaction: Chris and Helen will be available to assist with any enquiries
house_rules: The kitchen area is for use by the owners not for guests use.   There are 3 rooms bookable at Linley House however if they are all booked except one room this will not show on the calendar.
host_about: Chris and I enjoy meeting new people and have been running our bed and breakfast business for 6 years.  Chris has retired from the finance industry and is loving his new role as host.  He will give you privacy and be there to assist with advice if required.

name: Terrace house in Glebe, Sydney
summary: Comfortable three-bedroom home in the heart of bohemian Glebe, close to cafes, wine bars, city and harbour.
space: We have a spacious 3-bedroom home in Glebe, in the heart of Sydney, near cool cafes and a great selection of restaurants – from good cheap eats to fine dining. The house is a large two-storey home with 3 large bedrooms, living room, dining room, additional TV room, and mod cons including 32-inch TV, dishwasher, Playstation, and high-speed wireless internet.  The house has high ceilings and is lovely and cool in the summer months. There is a fan in each room for the warmest nights. The backyard is 20 metres long and 5 metres wide and is a great space to host a barbecue or just let the kids run wild. The garden opens up directly onto a lovely safe, quiet, grassy park with two tennis courts that are available for rent. Glebe is next to Sydney University and a ten-minute bus ride from the city and all its attractions. The light rail runs through Glebe and is an easy ride to the Fish Markets, Chinatown and Central Station.  Bondi Beach and Maroubra are around 20 minutes away by car if you f

name: FAB SELF CONTAINED STUDIO IN SYDNEY
summary: - Self contained studio with fabulous rooftop views to Harbour Bridge and Opera House - Rooftop pool, BBQ and laundry facilities - On doorstep to numerous and wide ranging cafes, restaurants and bars - On doorstep to transport options  (walk, train, bus, taxis) for quick & easy access to Sydney's tourist, shopping  and beach attractions
space: Welcome to this fully furnished light filled STUDIO sized apartment in the secure art deco WESTBURY building.  The apartment Enjoy the fantastic rooftop pool & BBQ with stunning views of the Harbour, the Bridge and Opera House. Great for entertaining or dining on the picnic tables - particularly on warm summer evenings.  The apartment is quiet and includes: - TV and DVD player - Queen sized bed with large mirrored wardrobe - Separate travertine bathroom - Fully equipped kitchen with microwave / convection oven, cooker and a new fridge - Tons of closet space - WiFi internet throughout  - Modern (onsite) shared coin operated washer and dryer laundry facilities are available - you can also hang dry your clothes. This fabulous studio is all yours during your stay and is rented in its entirety, not as a shared space, so your privacy is guaranteed. It also comes with extra  spare towels.

neighborhood_overview: - Easy and fast transport options to access the sights and attractions of Sydney.  -  On the doorstep to a wide variety of cafes and restaurants of numerous cuisines, styles and price ranges.
notes: Eating and out and about..... Up Market Restaurants at Woolloomooloo Cowper Wharf.... * China Doll - Asia * Otto - Italian * Sienna Marina * Manta - seafood Good Restaurants.... * Foo Man Choo - virtually next door. Innovative asian fusion, great ambiance and good wine selection - highly recommended  * Onde - 346 Liverpool St. Darlinghurst - French Bistro w/ blackboard menu - highly recommended * Spice I Am - Darlinghurst * Jimmy Liks - Potts Point * Mezzaluna - Potts point * Macleay Street Bistro - Potts Point * Sel & Poivre (French) - Darlinghurst cafes for brekky..... * Several good cafes nearby in Darlinghurst road and many in nearby Victoria Street  * Almond  Cafe (The Royal) on corner Darlinghurst Road and Liverpool Street (quite close) - very good.  Cocktail Bar * Velluto Bar - Kings Cross (stylish cosy) Gelato.. * Messina - Famous  (may need to line up) - Victoria Street Darlinghurst
transit: - Train (Kings across station) 5 minutes walk for easy access to Sydney's extensive railway network - Close-by enroute bus services.  - Taxis easily hailed from the street. - Tourist kiosk on Darlinghurst Road for advice and brochures -  10 minutes walk Getting From the Airport:  - Train to  Kings Cross Station (one way $17.60 per person from International / $17.00 from Domestic).  Need to change at Central Station. - Shuttle "Ready2go" door to door service (one way $22 per person). Door to Door service. - Taxi - price depends on time of day and traffic (approx. $40 to $65)
access: Roof top pool and BBQ area and shared laundry.
interaction: On an as required basis, particularly for checking in and meet and greet times, etc.
house_rules: - No smoking in apartment -  Observe pool/rooftop amenity area hours -  $120 for lost security key
host_about: My name is Max.  I enjoy the theatre, ballet, the arts and other wonderful events of Sydney.  Knowing what to do, where to dine out and how best to get around is my speciality for helping new comers enjoy the delights of Sydney and nearby areas.

name: Own Private House in North Bondi
summary: Cosy 2 ½ bed semi in a very quite area of Bondi. Close enough to walk to Bondi Beach but far enough to escape the hustle and bustle. Good variety of local cafes just around the corner and perfect for a small family or a couple wanting a bit of space.
space: The place would be perfect for a couple or young family. We have three young kids ourselves. So toys for different age groups are available. It has a lovely outdoor area and garden, making it perfect for meals outside. We would love you to have a BBQ out the back and take in the serene surroundings - but its not a party place.  Location! It is in walking distance to beautiful Bondi beach and the many shops and restaurants in the Bondi area. name: Modern inner city Sydney terrace
summary: A perfect family home in a laid back, very trendy inner city neighbourhood with ease of access to local amenities, great food, bars, and parent friendly activities. This house would suit larger travelling parties and could potentially accommodate up to 6 people, or a young family who can utilise kids room that feature a small bed and bunk, children's books, toys and bath.
space: Bright, sun filled four bedroom terrace on a leafy street in East Redfern. Period two story house with lovely original features, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Courtyard includes use of mini Webber BBQ and al fresco dining table. Surrounded by cafes, bars, shops, supermarket, parks and everything you could possibly need. Close to public transport with bike lane access at the front door. Ten minutes walk to Surry Hills with modern public library, boutique supermarkets, cafes, small bars and nightclubs. Ten minute bus ride to the city centre and 15 minute walk to local train station. Two minutes walk to trendy Dank St, flanked by art galleries, boutique shops and top foodie haunts.  Free high speed WIFI, dishwasher and full laundry facilities, two modern bathroom (ground floor with bathtub), four burner gas oven, microwave, Bluetooth speaker, large screen TV, Netflix, digital and analogue radios and built in wardrobes. name: Manly Beach
summary: A great 2-bedroom ground floor apartment in a quiet 4 unit block. The unit is around the corner from Manly Beach and opposite Queenscliff lagoon & park. This is the perfect pad for a romantic weekend away or a great family holiday at the beach (the second room has two cots).
space: This is the perfect place for a romantic couple's weekend away or a family holiday with the  beach a 1 minute walk away. This is a two-bedroom unit, however one bedroom is set up for two babies / young child. We have made the unit child friendly and as safe as possible.  This is a 2 bedroom home at the famous Manly Beach, Sydney, Australia. You can check the surf from the bedroom, grab a coffee from one of the many cafe's within a 3-5 minute walk, or take a walk along the beachfront promenade to the busy hub with great shops! Both bedrooms are a great size. The main bedroom features a queen-sized bed and the second bedroom has two cots.  Shelley Beach (a 25 minute walk) is an amazing spot for snorkelling, and you can swim anywhere along the Manly Beach stretch (1 minute walk and you're at the beach). For the surfers, Queenscliff surf club is a 1 minute walk around the corner. This is a great spot to swim or surf.  The entire home, includes two living areas, two bedrooms, bathroom, kitc

neighborhood_overview: The famous Manly beach is on the doorstep of our home with fantastic cafes, shops and restaurants a short scenic stroll.  There is excellent swimming, snorkelling, surfing and leisure activities at your fingertips.
notes: We love our home and the location. We have the unit professionally cleaned beforehand and would like the unit left as it was found by guests.
transit: Everything Manly has to offer is here. Manly beach is literally over the road (surf-checks from both bedrooms), great cafe's are 30 seconds walk out the front door, and the Manly corso with it's plethora of shops is a short 8-10 minute walk away. A 10-15 minute walk to Manly Ferry enables visitors a harbour cruise into Sydney city.
access: Entire home, including living area, TV, free Wi-Fi, two bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, laundry facilities and backyard.
interaction: Guests will have the place entirely to themselves.
house_rules: No parties or excessive noise. No smoking allowed inside. Please respect the neighbours at all times! No pets at all thank you.
host_about:
We live in Manly (Sydney). Bev is from Christchurch (NZ) but has been living here 10 years, Jen is from Sydney. Bev runs his own business (Camera Hire), Jen is a high school teacher.

We love living in Manly and hope you'll love it here too.

name: ★★★★★ Executive Home - Walk to Bondi Beach & Cafes
summary: Just renovated Bondi Beach Residence in best central location with easy walk to Bondi Beach, local shops, coffee shops and restaurants, bus stop at the door with fast access to  Sydney tourist attractions as well as Sydney CBD. This home is suitable for executives, a couple, or family 1-2 kids who love great design and beachy feel and indoor-outdoor living. More comfortable than a hotel that feels like home. Enjoy spectacular beauty, relaxing and ultra-cool lifestyle of Bondi Beach
space: Walk in from the main street, with no steps on your way and enter the residence positioned at the back, away from main street, eastern side of the block filled with morning sun. Large designer kitchen fully equipped with all you need including granite benchtops, gas cooking, dishwasher and new fridge. Breakfast benchtop with high chairs will give you comfort and convenience of quick meal before exploring Bondi’s best or before working day. Open plan kitchen flows into a large living area ensuring you are always part of the action when you prepare a coffee, light meal or family dinner. Lounge room provides ample space with 3 sitter sofa bed, large tv and radio. Additional table and chairs provided to offer additional sitting and table space.    Double size bedroom offers two king single beds that can be joined or separated to offer convenient sleeping configuration. Large floor to ceiling build in wardrobe will give you ample space to store your belongings for the duration of your stay.

name: Sunny apartment Inner West Sleeps 4
summary: You'll love this 2 bedroom inner west apartment - perfect for a couple, friends, small family or just yourself.  A short walk to vibrant, bustling shops, restaurants, train station (22min ride to Central). Light filled, polished floorboards, modern kitchen & bathroom. One large bedroom with double bed & cupboard, second bedroom queen bed & study. Great public transport options for getting around. Short or longer term stays welcome.  Discounts offered Weekly discount: 10% Monthly discount: 20%
space: :::BEDROOMS::: One main, large bedroom with lots of natural light.  Room is furnished with comfy, new double bed and spacious wardrobe. Second with a double bed, storage space and desk. :::MAIN LIVING SPACES::: The house is spacious, light-filled and comfortable with a small dining area when eating in. A fully equipped kitchen for cooking up meals is available to you when you decide to stay in - with access to condiments, spices, appliances, toaster, kettle, selection of teas, coffee, microwave and ample space in the pantry & fridge for your food.    AMENITIES Included for all guests are the following: - Free WiFi - Heater and floor fan  - TV and DVD - Iron and ironing board - Washer and dryer located in separate laundry space within the building - Fresh, clean towels, linen and toiletries provided - Public transport timetables - Local restaurant menus - Brochures on what's on around town and other useful travel info from a local Sydneysider. neighborhood_overview: Campsie is a bustling, diverse and multicultural suburb where you will get to experience many cultures and enjoy incredible restaurants and local offerings: from Vietnamese Pho, Malaysian delights, Middle Eastern groceries, Indian samosas, cafes to frozen yoghurt! And so much more. Local food is affordable and many restaurants and eateries are family-run with authentic dishes you'd have to travel all over Sydney to find.  Each year in May, the Campsie Food Festival celebrates the suburbs love of food and diversity: (website hidden) Campsie has parks, a swimming pool and an ice rink. Well serviced by public transport. Just a stones throw from the inner west suburbs of Newtown (short walks from St Peters or Erskineville train stations) and Marrickville, Dulwich Hill.  To the West on the train line, you can explore the foods and cultures of Belmore, Lakemba, Bankstown and more.
notes: - This listing is for an entire apartment - it is a great apartment and location for either a short visit or if you are arriving in Australia looking to settle and need a place to land whilst you find your feet and a more permanent home. - The nightly and weekly rates are significantly less than most other listings on AirBnB for two simple reasons: 1. I am not greedy 2. I am not interested in contributing to inflating an already unaffordable housing market in Sydney.  - Maximum booking is for 4 guests. - Longer stays are discounted - see weekly and monthly rates.  - Check-in and check out times are negotiable - I am more than happy for guests to have early check-ins and late check-outs where preparation and cleaning time required allows this.  - Please check with me if other arrangements are necessary. Discounts offered for long term rental. Weekly discount: 10% Monthly discount: 20%
transit: Short walk to train station and convenient, well serviced inner west train line. Express trains to Central and City Circle (under 25 minutes). Stops at Dulwich Hill, Marrickville, Sydneham, Erskineville, St Peters (along King St walk down to Newtown), Redfern and more. Also heads west to Bankstown and more.  Bus routes include stops at the City, Earlwood, Petersham, Camperdown, Burwood, Bankstown and so much more. Taxi rank located at the top of North Parade - 9 minute walk from apartment. 20 minutes to either the City or the Airport. Short drive to Summer Hill and other inner west suburbs. Lots of interesting shops along the main drag. Campsie shopping centre just off Beamish St with a Big W, homewares, discount stores and other shops. Supermarket, medical centres, dentist, pharmacies, shoe repair - everything a traveller could need. Canterbury Ice Rink and swimming pools located on the same street.
access: Entire apartment. You have a whole apartment to yourself - affordable without being contained to a single room or sofa bed in someone else's house! Suits friends, couples or a family seeking a short or long term stay but on a budget - prices kept within rental market range.  With access to private outdoor space in the form of a small courtyard-like garden around the side of building. Plenty of street parking available. Beamish Street is close by (10 minute walk) with a variety of shops, supermarkets, restaurants, trains and buses that go regularly to the airport, city and many Sydney suburbs.
interaction: None - my apartment is available to you while I am living elsewhere.  I can meet to give you the keys and let you in and see you off.  Or we can arrange to leave keys with the neighbours.
house_rules: The is a non-smoking apartment inside.  Please consider other residents in the apartment building and keep the noise to an acceptable level.  Please keep the internal hallway door closed when cooking and use the fan force extractor above the stove to contain any cooking smells. Please wipe down surfaces after cooking. Please be respectful of the space. If anything breaks, needs repair or my attention, please let me know so that I can attend to it during your stay or for the next guest. The apartment caters to a maximum of 4 people. Generally, I will be available to meet you upon arrival and to give you keys. We can determine a suitable check in time closer to your arrival. If I am unable to meet you, I will arrange for the key to be left in a secure location and will contact you about this. Once you arrive, there will be further information about the apartment and getting around - some of which is included below.
host_about:
I recently took some time off from my job at a progressive think tank to do some thinking of my own - channeling energy into teaching, learning, writing and just figuring out amongst all the exciting projects what to dive into next.

In my spare time you might find me breathing deeply in a yoga class, relishing my first coffee for the day, doing the crossword, digging my hands in the dirt in my vegie garden or heading onto the dancefloor for an uplifting boogie.

I enjoy meeting passionate people with interesting opinions and ideas. Mostly I just like being out and about in the world.

I'm considerate, respectful and responsible. I enjoy a good chat but I can also appreciate that people need their space. I make a great house guest and a great host - just ask anyone who has had me over or who was ever in need of a place to stay for the night, the week or sometimes longer that I have welcomed into my home.

name: Beautiful Bushland Retreat Sydney
space: Fantastic private studio flat with a beautiful pool. You have a private  entrance (accessed by steps at the side of the house) to come and go as you please. Cronulla beach and the Royal National Park are incredibly close, for you to explore. Great double bedroom with an open plan lounge room, and a well provisioned kitchenette. Additionally, a barbecue is available to get you into the Australian spirit.  This property really is a gem and for a couple, just perfect. As you can see from the photos, the place is just beautiful and has that Balinese touch.  The neighborhood is beautiful and safe, and the retreat is nestled on the edge of the Royal National Park. We have some great restaurants in the surrounding areas.    The train station is a 15 minute walk from the house. From the train station you can get into the city and down to the beach very easily. Check in/out times are very flexible unless new guests are arriving on the same day as departing guests. In that case, we ask that depa

notes: An initial supply of bread, cereal, margarine, milk and fresh fruit is provided
house_rules: House Rules. *No parties  *Respect the furniture & fittings within the Studio Flat *Keep the Studio clean during your stay.  *If you see a possum, have a pat & feed it if you want..HA  And most of all enjoy your stay!!!!!
host_about:
WELL WHAT TO SAY!!!

We are very happy to be part of the Airbnb experience. We live in a lovely house in Sydney, connected to the Australian bush.

We love seeing people from different parts of the world and are well travelled ourselves. Our household is more than inviting, and believe that you will love it as we do.

We love good food and try to get to as many restaurants as possible to open up our culinary palates.   

Your stay will be second to none as we have been told on many occasions that it's a little gem. 

If we were to sum up a life nutshell, we would say get into it as you only get one!

Looking forward to having a chat around the pool!!!!!!

Maryellen & John

name: Family Friendly House in Randwick
summary: Clean, comfortable family home in beachside Randwick, short walk to Coogee Beach.
space: Lovely family home in beachside Coogee/Randwick. Two blocks from “The Spot” precinct with cinema, bars and restaurant and only 10 mins walk to Coogee Beach. 15 mins bus or taxi to the city. Close to the airport. This 4 bedroom family friendly house is recently renovated. This entire home can accommodate up 7 and extra mattresses are available for kids if required. It's a family home, so well set up for kids.  All beds have quality linen.  The lovely private backyard is perfect for entertaining and BBQ’s.  The main double bedroom upstairs offers a queen bedroom with ensuite with separate bath and shower, walk-in wardrobe and a private courtyard.  The second bedroom has a double bed, the third has a king-single (currently photographed with a bunk bed, which will be replaced by 17th Dec) and the fourth has a day bed that converts to a full king-size bed.  The downstairs bathroom is flooded with light and features a shower bath.  The main living area has a living room with TV, BluRay/DVD p

neighborhood_overview: Randwick is a beachside suburb, next to Coogee Beach. The house is 2 blocks from a cinema and restaurant precinct, and 15 mins walk to Coogee Beach.
transit: There is a driveway with one parking spot, as well as street parking.  There is a bus stop 50 metres from the front door. Public transport goes straight to the city from this stop, as well as the Bondi Junction shopping area.
access: Access all areas, except our office, which will stay locked, and the studio out the back.
interaction: As we rent the place out when we are travelling, we cannot help in-person, but will remain in contact via phone and the AirBNB app to answer and address any issues. If necessary, we will send an assistant to the house to assist.
house_rules: Do not smoke inside.  Remember to turn off all cooking equipment, heating and lights. We expect that you'll treat our house as you would your own, as it is our family home.  No parties allowed.
host_about: We love our family home in beachside Randwick and we know you will enjoy it!

name: SYDNEY INNER CITY SANCTUARY -  FREE PARKING
summary: This fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment is positioned in a stylish security complex a short stroll to trendy Darlinghurst's village cafe precinct and Rushcutters Bay.
space: Enjoying a peaceful and light-filled ambience with district Paddington views this apartment boasts a large dining & living area and open plan gas kitchen complete with stone top breakfast bar.  Queen beds with built-in wardrobes in each room, 2 bathrooms, the main with bathtub. The Master room has ensuite with juliette balcony overlooking the complex's beautifully manicured gardens.  Savour great living with a large LCD CABLE television, FREE UNLIMITED high speed WIRELESS INTERNET access, fully equipped internal laundry, reverse cycle air conditioning, gas heating & double car space.  The building complex offers a gym and visitor parking. Close to shops, supermarkets, public transport and restaurants within minutes from Sydney CBD. The perfect apartment for those wanting to live in comfortable luxury whilst enjoying the great atmosphere of Sydney's Eastern Suburbs. house_rules: Standard Terms and Conditions of Temporary Holiday Accommodation Note: Please write to me if you would like something different and I will see what I can do. GUESTS PROVIDED WITH: Kitchen * 1 x teatowel Bathroom * 1 x hand towel * 1 x bathmat * shampoo & conditioner  * body soap & hand soap * 2 x toilet paper rolls * 1 x towel per guest Beds * 2 x pillows per headspace * 2 x sheets * 1 quilt If you require to use second set of linen and towels without booking extra guests, the charge for replenishing without notice is up to $75. If you would like to use extra linen without booking please enquire beforehand. GUEST CHECKOUT OBLIGATIONS * Leave property how it was found.  * Take rubbish with you by disposing in allocated garbage bins * Move furniture to original positions, wash dishes. * Leave keys in required place * Failure to follow these obligations may incur a penalty fee. Disqualification fees may be applied for using bond monies. ALL BOOKINGS MADE ACCEPT THESE TERMS Owners will do
host_about:
Based in Bondi Beach, I enjoy the outdoors and exploring natural landscapes. Passionate about arts and crafts, I enjoy creating basketry from plant based fibres. I also love designing furniture from recycled items. I like to travel in good company and find inspiration from new creative activities from around the world. 

I am available to guests within 20 minutes from their property. I provide a 24 hour point of contact for guests. I do my best to keep the place perfectly maintained and hire professional cleaners  to make sure the place is in impeccable condition for incoming guests.

name: The Chee Bondi - Beach Studio 06
summary: STUDIO 06 IS A LOVELY APARTMENT RIGHT IN THE HEART OF BONDI VILLAGE.  Fully equipped short term/ holiday rentals only 100m from Bondi Beach. We have a number of studios in our family owned/operated unit block. **Love Bondi Live Local**
space: STUDIO 6 IS A SUNNY AND OFF STREET APARTMENT IN THE HEART OF BONDI VILLAGE WITH SECURE OFF STREET PARKING (for resident guest car only, available on request). Located on the second floor at rear of building, away from street noise with afternoon sun. It is tastefully decorated and fully renovated with separate kitchen. Air-con, Widescreen TV, Apple TV with Netflix and free  WiFi. A 2 minute walk from our front door to Bondi Beach and located in the heart of Bondi village. Cafes, restaurants, bars, cool shops and local amenities are at your doorstep. Minutes from bus stops (333, 380 and 389 to Bondi Junction, Oxford St Paddington, City and Circular Quay). Only 2km to Westfield Bondi Junction and train station. Resident manager onsite.  *We also have other similar studios available in the building. * Our rates are seasonally adjusted. ***Please note Xmas and New Year period  16th Dec - 5 Jan is a 5 night minimum stay. neighborhood_overview: Bondi. A village by the sea. A thriving sea side destination with all year swimming and water sports. We also have one of Sydney's best boutique shopping areas and some of the best cafes and eateries in the city.
notes: Our rates change seasonally, once you select your dates, Airbnb will provide the correct pricing. We do not cancel confirmed bookings. Stair access only.
transit: Buses run every 10-15 minutes to Bondi Junction 7 and the city. Bus stops are 2 minutes walk from The Chee Bondi. Trains run from Bondi Junction to the city and beyond. You can walk to Bondi Junction in 30 minutes.
access: Guests have access to their studio, share walkway balcony and also to the laundry area at rear of building
interaction: We are live-in owner, managers and we personally check our guests in. We are also available for information or any other enquiries our guests may have during their stay.
house_rules: HOUSE RULES: Maximum 2 persons per studio. (extra child under 12 yrs old, maybe accommodated. Please contact managers before making a booking). NON SMOKING BUILDING - smoking of any sort is not allowed- includes inside apartment outside balconies/ walkways and common areas and stairwell. Car parking (1) is for guest only, and must be requested at time of booking to secure a car space. This is also a residential building. No loud noise after 10pm. No parties. No Smoking or candles in rooms. Cleaning costs (extra charge) apply for smoke removal and damage to furnishings. DO NOT COOK PUNGENT FOODS (like curries or strong aromas), as the smell infiltrates the apartment and furnishings, this will require professional cleaning (cost will be recovered from security deposit). When cooking or using the toaster, please open windows and operate cooktop fans. -  We kindly ask that you do not leave the air conditioning on when you are not in the studio. name: THE GREEN ROOM
summary: Bright, light private room with super-comfortable queen size bed. Shared bathroom right next to the bedroom. Pool & Bush View All bed rooms are private to you There are also communal areas Your hosts also live on the premises.
space: Welcome! Large eclectic artistic style home with the biggest private saltwater solar heated pool in Beacon Hill. Every bedroom has a double bed, and we also have 2 twin share rooms. Large room with very comfortable queen size bed, fitted with full length mirrors wardrobe and draws for storing your luggage. Linen and towels included. Large shared bathroom with shower, toilet and drawers for storing your bathroom items. Couples or friends sharing are welcome: the overnight rate is per person. Guest bathroom is a large shared bathroom with a lock on the door. There are 3 bathrooms / toilets in the house total. We allow small fridge space for our guests. Prepared dinner most nights, available on request & included in price. Meet our other guests and enjoy the conversation. We provide a real fire in winter, a huge pool for summer swimming. House backs onto beautiful bushland reserve with walking tracks & waterfalls Uniquely we offer a freshly prepared dinner around the family table

neighborhood_overview: Pleasant green and very safe area,  15 - 20 minutes drive to many beaches including Manly. also close to Westfield Warringah Mall, and various Conference centres.
notes: *no children under 12 allowed, as our home has many stairs & and a pool area which is not a safe place for young children or babies *We are not responsible for any air carrier delays, missed flights or rescheduling of your flight, travel plans or accidents .  We do not owe you any refund for booked nights missed due to your airline or travel complications.  Please look to your travel insurance agent to cover this.
transit: E (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) buses  street parking is free
access: lounge tv / music / clothes washing machine pool and pool / garden area easy free street parking
interaction: we are around if you need support, but respect your privacy
house_rules: We appreciate that many people are in Australia to enjoy Sydney,culture and English language. We expect that people would speak English in communal areas. We offer a typical Australian home stay experience where people of many cultures interact and help each other. We offer a pleasant home stay , where we serve dinner around the dinner table almost every evening and have a conversation about each persons' day and plans  As it is home stay we sometimes ask for help with simple duties like drying dishes or unpacking the dishwasher. This is not a 5 star resort, but it is a great home. Be respectful of our home, other guests , pets, and waste recycling .   Smoking is allowed , outside only.
host_location: Beacon Hill, New South Wales, Australia
host_about:
We are friendly, easy going, love to cook, love meeting people from other countries.
creative type people: art therapist, furniture renovation & upcycling furniture.
we both love to read, catch up on tv, walk the dogs, socialise with friends and family, and travel.
We have enjoyed hosting many people from many countries.
We will help orientate you around the local area, and transport system, entertainment, attractions, walks, sport and events in Sydney.
We are 30 minutes from Manly by bus, and 50 minutes by bus from the city centre. 
We are 35 minutes away from Chatswood on the bus.
The bus stops are 5 minutes walk away. 
We have previously hosted many wonderful guests of all ages.
We have 2 dogs, who live with us indoors & outdoors.
We also have a great salt water swimming pool which guests can use at any time.
Our main expectations of our guests are that they are communicative and well organised.
Maybe you don't mind helping with the dishes & dishwasher sometimes if you choose to partake in communal meals or bbq's.
& are respectful of other guests and home security.
Wifi available 
Police Clearance Certificate Available

name: Absolute privacy 5 min to rails. Comfort in nature
summary: Very private, surrounded by trees,overlooking pure nature,quiet and peaceful. At the same time close to public transport, buses and rails.
space: Family friendly, private and convenient place The Accommodation We have a beautiful, newly renovated, self-contained, 2 bedroom apartment to offer. It occupies the whole ground floor with private entry.  It is a spacious apartment (aprox. 75 sq.m.) surrounded by bushland , heritage gum trees and high quality houses in a prestigious family friendly and safe suburb , close to all amenities. From the comfort of a huge, private deck coming off the large open-plan living area, enjoy the leafy peace and quiet of our tropical garden, the bushland view and local birds and wildlife.  Location This unique apartment set amongst the natural beauty of northern Sydney, it is also only 5 minutes walk to the train station, giving you easy access to and from the airport and to all city attractions. It is easy direct train ride from the city centre, the Opera House, Circular Quay, etc. It is a short drive to the beach and a shopping centre is nearby. name: Comfortable family house- Kingsford
summary: Great, comfortable and quiet family house, centrally located to enjoy Sydney's city, parks, harbour, beaches and fireworks!
space: fully furnished 3 BR + loft + study family house for rent near Kingsford. Our clean, bright, comfortable house is in a quiet, pleasant street. It is art-deco in style, warm in winter, cool in summer. It was renovated in 2015.  The house includes: •A good-sized master bedroom, with a queen sized bed, bedside table, built-in wardrobe, ceiling fan and TV • A child's bedrooms with a single bed, built-in wardrobe, ceiling fan, desk, bedside table and lamp •A third bedroom with a single or queen sized bed, ceiling fan, wardrobe, desk and lamp •A loft above the kitchen which overlooks the lounge room, with two single mattresses pure wool carpet  •A study with desk and ceiling fan •An open-plan room which comprises of a large fully-equipped kitchen, dining table and chairs, sofa, large TV, ceiling fan •a driveway with enough room for 1 car, and plenty of street parking.  •a nice roomy backyard, with grass, a veggie patch, jasmine, neighbour’s overhanging frangipani trees, a huge outdoor settin
description: Great, comfortable and quiet family house, centrally located to enjoy Sydney's city, parks, harbour, beaches and fireworks! fully furnished 3 BR + loft + study family house for rent near Kingsford. Our clean, bright, comfortable house is in a quiet, pleasant street. It is art-deco in style, warm in winter, cool in summer. It was renovated in 2015.  The house includes: •A good-sized master bedroom, with a queen sized bed, bedside table, built-in wardrobe, ceiling fan and TV • A child's bedrooms with a single bed, built-in wardrobe, ceiling fan, desk, bedside table and lamp •A third bedroom with a single or queen sized bed, ceiling fan, wardrobe, desk and lamp •A loft above the kitchen which overlooks the lounge room, with two single mattresses pure wool carpet  •A study with desk and ceiling fan •An open-plan room which comprises of a large fully-equipped kitchen, dining table and chairs, sofa, large TV, ceiling fan •a driveway with enough room for 1 car, and plenty of street parking.
house_rules: No smoking inside the house or cigarette butts in the garden (or under the deck). No high-heeled shoes on our floorboards or deck.  As a condition of renting our home, we request that you leave it clean for us to move straight back into. This means cleaning the bathroom, kitchen, vacuuming or sweeping the floors, as well as stripping the beds and putting the linen in the washing basket. If you fail to do this, you will be charged a $300 cleaning fee. Thanks. Also, please water the gardens twice a week before 9am or after 5pm, especially if it is not raining, and the plants and lawns look thirsty.  Please help yourself to any fruit, veggies, herbs, and salads from our garden while you are here.  We are experienced house-renters, and can give you lots of help and advice to plan your trip in Sydney/ Australia. We can speak fluent French if that helps you.
host_about: I love Sydney and sharing our home with people from around the world.

name: Surry Hills:Luxury Apartment & Pool
space: Welcome to Surry Hills! This apartment is available on a long term lease, minimum of one year. Fully furnished including all bills. Bargain! Move to Sydney and not have to worry about sorting our furniture, getting utilities and wifi connected! About the Apartment: Luxury apartment located in one of Sydney's trendiest suburbs, Surry Hills. Features a comfortably furnished large living space with open plan kitchen and a separate bedroom with Queen size bed. There is a fold out double bed in the living room. The living area is North East facing and receives glorious morning sunlight. The roof top, with pool and BBQ area, boasts 360 views over Sydney, and is a perfect spot to hang out on a sunny day or balmy evening. Location: Two minutes walk to Central Station, where you can connect to all Sydney buses and trains. Crown St and Oxford St, where most of Sydney's best bars, restaurants and clubs are located, are just around the corner. Within walking distance of t

house_rules: Please don't smoke inside. Smokers can go up to the roof top or outside.  Please respect other guests by the pool but not making too much noise or using glass in the pool area.  The rooftop area is open from 6.30am – 10.30pm. Please do not walk on the floor boards with high heels.
host_about:
Hi everyone - I'm a kiwi girl at heart but have spent more time living abroad than I have in NZ.  Having lived in the UK for 10 years, I've now been in Sydney for 8 years and love the lifestyle.

I'm into healthy clean living, love doing yoga and hanging out at the beach.

Travel is a top priority for me, a recent trip to Bali was awesome and my next planned trip is 3 months in India.

My apartment is a lovely comfortable place full of natural light were you can kick back and relax!

name: The Ranger's Cottage Manly Bush View Beach House
summary: Located  moments from the famous Manly to Spit walkway, the cottage is set in a quiet leafy cul de sac with Sydney Harbour a few footsteps away and native bush on one side of the road and quiet safe beaches a short walk away. Newly refurbished with buses at the top of the street and a good range of cafes and shops a short walk away.  It is a charming holiday cottage for up to four guests.
space: Welcome! Our Cottage Set in a quiet, leafy cul de sac, with a bush reserve on one side of the street and a secluded arm of Sydney Harbour just a stone's throw away, the Ranger's Cottage offers a delightful home away from home. Newly refurbished, fully self-contained and sunny, the Cottage features a main room (including kitchenette), bedroom, bathroom, laundry facilities and private outdoor courtyard and grassy front lawn with new energy efficient Air-conditioning. On the Harbour The Cottage is located on the famous Manly to Spit Scenic Walkway, with Manly about 30 minutes’ walk away (or five minutes by car).  Picturesque Forty Baskets Beach (a sandy and safe harbour beach with enclosed swimming area, jetty, rock pools, free barbecues and swings) is an easy eight minute walk through the bush reserve on a sealed path.  A great café serving delicious coffee, breakfast, lunch and ice cream is a three minute walk via a pedestrian bridge across a cascading stream.  Opposite it is North Harb
description: Located  moments from the famous Manly to Spit walkway, the cottage is set in a quiet leafy cul de sac with Sydney Harbour a few footsteps away and native bush on one side of the road and quiet safe beaches a short walk away. Newly refurbished with buses at the top of the street and a good range of cafes and shops a short walk away.  It is a charming holiday cottage for up to four guests. Welcome!
